325b1(mdo bskal bzang): grangs dag ni brgyad khri yim mya ngan 'das pa de'i dachos dag/ lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ snong gsuM mchod rten bzang pos gang bar 'gyur/ je ni
325b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa srid pa'i me tog gi/ skye ba'i yul ni grags pas bsgrags zhes bya/ rigs ni bre ze yin te 'od kyi chad/ sum bcu rtsa lnga yab ni srid mtha' yin/ blo gros nyi ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yu oHsras nyi zla ri
325b3(mdo bskal bzang): gro ba/ dgra bcom dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ 'phags la dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la'ang / nga med na mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa po// bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu bani
325b4(mdo bskal bzang): bzhi yod/ mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri nyi stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs nyi khri cig stong bar du gnas/ sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/ gcig ste rin chen bkod
325b5(mdo bskal bzang): pas rab tu brgyan/ 'jig rten 'gon po mdzod spu ldan pa'i/ skye ba'i yul ni stegs mchog mchog ces bya/ rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad sum bcu la ba ni rab gsal yin// rtul shugs
325b6(mdo bskal bzang): grub pa ces bya rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po zla sdug rab dga' rim gro ba/ thar pa'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gcig kun la'ang / 
325b7(mdo bskal bzang): ri'i rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo ba/ bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/ mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyi stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs nyi khri nyi skyong bar du gnas/ rgyal po'i sku gdus
325b8(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ mchod rten bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu 'byung / sangs rgyas spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po yi/ skye ba'i yul ni sna tshogs mdzes zhes bya/ rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad
326a1(mdo bskal bzang): dpag tsang bzhi bcul ba ni skyon med yin/ yon tan mthong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ yon tan sras po blo ldan rim gro pa/ rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ nor lnga'i tog ces bya brdzu 'phrul can
326a2(mdo bskal bzang): 'dus pa lan grangs chub cu kun la'ang/ chu dang namakha' lwa bur gsal ba bo// bye ba phrag ni chu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ mi no lo grangs chu khri nyis skyeng yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dri chos dag/ lo grangs rgyu hrIH
326a3(mdo bskal bzang): sbyang bar du gnas/ 'gro la phran phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/ rgyas par 'gyur to zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ye shes rnal 'byor nga ro'i/ skye ba'i yul ni rnam grangs lha zhes bya/ rigs ni bram ze yin te/ 
326a4(mdo bskal bzang): 'od dpag tshad/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni ngos bzangs yin/ mtshan ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no// bsod nams 'od slas rtse bo rim gro ga/ rtul shugs grub tsos bya ba mkhas pa ste/ chags pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul/ 
326a5(mdo bskal bzang): can/ 'dus pa lan grangs sum bcu kun la'ang / dri bral 'jig rten dri ma dri med pa/ bye ba phrag ni sum bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ mi tshe lo grangs su mkhri bzhi stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs
326a6(mdo bskal bzang): sum khri cig steng bar du gnas/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/ bcu drug pa cig gser gyi bla rer ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'che ba'i/ skye ba'i yul ni bro ba'i mchog ces bya'o// rigs ni rgyal
326a7(mdo bskal bzang): rigs yin te 'od dngagi chad/ bye ba phrag gsum glang chen dbang po yab/ thar pa'i dbyings zhes bya ni rgyal yum lta bying sdus/ na chong bzang po zhes bya rgyal ba'i rim gro pa/ yon tan tshegs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ rnam par
326a8(mdo bskal bzang): grol ba'i bkod pardzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu drug kun la'ang / spyod pa 'khrul po med par gyur pa'o// bye ba phrag ni drug bcu 'dun bdun yod/ mi tshe lo grangs drug khri cu ba ni stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan
326b1(mdo bskal bzang): 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ ning rnams mchod rten dag gis gang bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa
326b2(mdo bskal bzang): skye ba'i yul ni bden pa gsal nas bya/ rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ chu bcu rtsa bzhi yab ni bkod pa yin/ gzi brjid chen po zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po nges pa bzang po rim gro pa/ yid 'jam pa zhes bya
326b3(mdo bskal bzang): ba mkhas pa ste/ byang chub drang po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu lnga kun la'ang / legs dul yid ldan glang po 'dra ba po// bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu rgu rgu yod/ mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/ 
326b4(mdo bskal bzang): yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs chu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/ dpag tshad bdun pa bzhi pa yid du 'ong / de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron
326b5(mdo bskal bzang): ma'i/ skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma'i tog ces bya/ rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshing / dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lha bzangs yin/ grags mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po 'khrul can mthu rtsal rimagro
326b6(mdo bskal bzang): ga mchod rten grags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/ gzungs kyi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu drug kun la'ang / srid pa kun las rnam grol yid ldan pa/ bye ba phrag ni drug bcu lnga lnga yod/ 
326b7(mdo bskal bzang): mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas de chos dge/ le grangs bduni khri bdun stong bar du gnas/ 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/ rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur
326b8(mdo bskal bzang): seMn snying po kra shis ldan pa'i/ skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid gsal zhes bya/ rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/ dpag ched khri yod ya ba ni lgang ba yin/ spyod pa can zhes bya'i rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po yad
327a1(mdo bskal bzang): 'od snang ldan rim grog chos kyi 'od ces bya ba mkhas paste/ yon tan mchog la gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs chu bcu kun la'ang / srid pa'i mdud pa tha~Md rnam grol ba/ bye ba phrag ni mU
327a2(mdo bskal bzang): lnga lnga yod/ michi lo grangs chu khri ga stong yin// mya ngan 'das nas de'i dam chos dag/ lo grangs rgyu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ sgra gdung mchod rten dpag chad brgyang bu gcig/ gser dang nor bu'i lnga l-Is
327a3(mdo bskal bzang): bar byas/ rgyal yul 'khor mya ngan 'ang ba'i/ skye ba'i yul ni mya ngad sel ces bya/ rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'ad kyi chang / dang ga tshang chu bcu lab ni dul ba yin// nyes pa spong zhes bya ba rgyal ba yum/ sras potshim
327a4(mdo bskal bzang): 'dor drag shul rim gro pa/ yon tan mig ces bye ba mkhas pa ste/ grags pa rim par sprul pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad bcu kun la'ang / dul ba'i yid ldan bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/ bye ba phra/ 
327a5(mdo bskal bzang): ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur/ miche lo grangs brgyad khri sum steng yin/ dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/ brgyad bcu rtsa gsum bar du gnas par 'gyur/ 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/ 
327a6(mdo bskal bzang): par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur te gang bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa'i// skye ba'i yul ni yid ni ma byed ces bya/ rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad stong yong rdzu 'phru
327a7(mdo bskal bzang): lha ni yab/ yid gnyis yod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po lta byed rim gro pa/ shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas bu ste/ mchog rgyal rdul shugs zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan gra ngas brgyad/ 
327a8(mdo bskal bzang): bcu gcig kun la'ang / bag chags pa mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan pa/ bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ mi tshe la grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grang/ 
327b1(mdo bskal bzang): brgyad khra'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ gcig sta nor bu bzang po'i dra bas spras/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa'i/ skye ba'i yul ni shes rab gsal zhes bya/ rgyal
327b2(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni chos bzangs yin/ thar pa'i rdul zhugs zhes pa rgyal ba'i yaM/ sras po tog ldan legs sems rim gro ba/ bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa smid
327b3(mdo bskal bzang): bkod pa gsal ba zhes byardzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lun+da grangs brgyad bcu kun la'ang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha mthor phyin pa po// bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu gnyis gnyis yod/ mi tshi lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin
327b4(mdo bskal bzang): snang ba med par phyin pa'i dri chos dge/ lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/ rin chen mang po'i dri bas mdzes par byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgo
327b5(mdo bskal bzang): ma can/ skye ba'i yul na chos kyi rgyal mtshan yin/ rgyal ba' rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad brgyad yod yab ni blo gros yin/ bzla mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po zla byin 'jam pa/ 
327b6(mdo bskal bzang): rim gre bo/ stobs pa sams ni blo gros can yin to/ 'khrug pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu kun la'ang / nga rgyal med pa'i dra bas 'jos pa po// bye ba phrag ni drug bcu lnga lnga
327b7(mdo bskal bzang): yo/ mi tshe le grangs drug khri drug stong yin/ yongasu mya dran 'das nas dam ches drag/ lo grangs drug khri lnga skyong bar du gnas/ thugs rje can gi sku gdung rgyas par 'gyur/ rin chen byi ba dag ni rab tu brgyan
327b8(mdo bskal bzang): 'jig rten 'gen po deg shin tu gzigs pa'i/ skyo ba'i yul ni gzi brjid smon zhes bya rgyal ba'i rigs ni bre ze 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni zhu med yin/ blo brtan 'dzin ces bya ba rgyal po'i yuM
328a1(mdo bskal bzang): sras be blo brtan blo bzangs rim gro pa/ rnam par snang byed ces bya mkhas pa ste/ 'jig rten sgra la 'jug pardzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu kun la'ang dug rtsa bcad dang mtshungs pa'i
328a2(mdo bskal bzang): bcom pa/ bye ba drag ni drug bcu gsum gsum yod/ mi tshe lo grangs drug khri sum stong yin/ rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas/ 'jig rten phan phyir rgyal
328a3(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i sku gdung dgra/ rgyas 'gyur khams gsum rgyas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'don pa'i/ skye ba'i yul ni dga' gsal zhes bya ba/ rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ dpag ma
328a4(mdo bskal bzang): bcu yid yab ni legs byin yin/ mchod sbyin 'jug ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po blo ldan zla byin rim gro lo rdo rje 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pasgo/ 'byor pa gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus
328a5(mdo bskal bzang): ba lan grangs bdun bcu kun la'ang / dri med tshul 'chos med pa'i dgra bcom pa/ bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu pa ni bzhi yod/ mi che lo grangs dgra ni brgyad khri yin/ rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ le/ 
328a6(mdo bskal bzang): grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ 'gro la phan phyir byams ldan rgyal po'i/ sku gdung rgyas 'gyur rnam par grang bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen skye ba'i na yul ni gdul bam
328a7(mdo bskal bzang): bka' ba zhes phya ga rgyal ba'i rigs ni bre ze 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad sum bcu ya ba ni num med yin/ bsod nams can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po spyan med gnyis go rim gro ba/ nor bu kaM zhes
328a8(mdo bskal bzang): bya ba mkhas pa ste/ gser sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/ de ni 'dus pa la ni grangs drug bcu ste/ thad dag la bye ba phrag dag ni/ rgu bcu rtsa ni bzhi bzhi yod/ mi tshe lo grangs brgya khri brgyad stong yin/ 
328b1(mdo bskal bzang): 'khrug pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag/ lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/ sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad radras pa cig/ nor bu'i gdugs dang bkod pa bla rer ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ma
328b2(mdo bskal bzang): tog gi/ skye ba'i yul ni na mkha' gsal zhes bya/ rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad gsu yod yab ni dpe myed yin/ 'brag sgra zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yaM/ sras po bsgom byed dul ba rim gro
328b3(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan 'od bzangs zhes bya mkhas pa ste/ lha'i gzhol med mtshungs pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs lnga bcu kun la'ang / dgra bcom bdud rnams 'joms par byed pa po/ bye ba phrag ni lnga bcu lnga ldi
328b4(mdo bskal bzang): yod/ mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs bzhi khri bar du gnas par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/ mchod rten bzang pos stong gsuM
328b5(mdo bskal bzang): gang bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i dbyangs skye ba'i/ yul ni drag shal sgra dag 'byung zhes bya/ rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad rga yod yab ni gnas pa mchog/ gser gyi
328b6(mdo bskal bzang): mdog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ 'jig rten lam sras sgron mo rim gro bA/ yon tan mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/ ku mu ti'i snying po rdzu 'phral can/ 'dus pa lan grangs drug bcu kun la'ang / bag chags rtsa
328b7(mdo bskal bzang): nas bton pa dgra bcom pa/ bye ba phrag ni drug bcu brgyad brgyad yod/ mi che lo grangs rku khri rgu stong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'dres nas de tshes dag/ lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ 'gro la phan phyir rgyal
328b8(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i sku gdung dag/ rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/ san snying po bde dang ldan pa'i/ skye yul gzi brjid yid du 'thad ces bya/ rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/ chu bcu rtsa dgu ljon par bang / 
329a1(mdo bskal bzang): ya'os mdos stonas shes sgyul drus smras po mags chog sa zlug smra ma skye dod la zugs pa DU du ma 'dus busan grangs pa
329a2(mdo bskal bzang): rtsalnga la// dgra bcom dza tha ba spangs pa'o// sa drug dang ni mtshungs pa shA skrag go// mchi lo grangs ni khri sum stong yin// rgyal ba mya ngan 'dang sa nas dam chos dag/ lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas pa
329a3(mdo bskal bzang): 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gcig pa/ rin chen brgya'i 'dra bas mdzes par byas/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa don dag gsung ba yi/ skye ba'i yul ni sgru ba gsal bya/ rigs ni rgyal rigs mi
329a4(mdo bskal bzang): ti 'od kyi ched/ dpag tshad gi stong lab ni zla b.ring yin/ sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po b+h+yo ldan snang ba'i mgro ba/ smyung ba b+h+rid ces bya blod+d+hon+dan te/ snyi 'od gsal zhes bya ba rdzu rgyas cam n+d+ha
329a5(mdo bskal bzang): ba ldan grangs ther 'bum phrag/ bcus thad la yang bsam gtan pa/ ther 'bum ther 'bum phrag ni 'dus par 'gyur/ mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/ yongasu mya ngana'ang sa nas dam chos
329a6(mdo bskal bzang): drag/ mo grangs slong snyed kho nar gnis par 'gyur/ 'grol ban phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/ rgyas 'gyur ni rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/ de ba'i nagashegs par gyes gagasal pa 'i
329a7(mdo bskal bzang): skye ba'i yul ni dge byed mchog ces bya/ rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad 'bum yong mi 'khrugs pa ni yab/ bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po bdud rtsi rnam grol
329a8(mdo bskal bzang): grob/ seng ge 'ing ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/ gnas pa mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan grangs sum bcu drug kun la'ang / thang gnas zhes bya ba mkhas pa po// bye ba phrag ni sum
329b1(mdo bskal bzang): bculnga lnga yong/ mchi la grangs sum drug stsong yin/ yongasu mya ngan 'dus nas dam chos drug/ so drangs drug zhinag slong bar druganas// sku gadzung mchong chen dpag ma gsum bcig/ rin chen
329b2(mdo bskal bzang): mchog gi rlabs mdzes par byas/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa seng ge 'on la skye ba'i/ yul ni s+thA ba'i mchod rten zhes kyang bya/ de rigs bram ze yin to 'od kyi chad/ dpag tshad stong 'ong yab ni gzi brjid bzang / 
329b3(mdo bskal bzang): gos la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po kha sbyar legs gnas rim gro ba/ ye shes zil gyis gnas pa mkhas pa ste/ mya ngan 'das par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa lan
329b4(mdo bskal bzang): bdun bcu kun la'ang / gti mug med pa'i pha mthar phyin 'phags pa/ bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu brgyad brgya yin/ mi che lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/ mya ngan 'das par phyin pa'i dam chos dag/ lo
329b5(mdo bskal bzang): grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ 'gro ba'i don dang phyir rgyal ba'i/ sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur/ mi'i 'dren pa btsug phung skye ba'i/ sus ni rin tshon rtsegs pa zhes kyang bya/ de'i/ 
329b6(mdo bskal bzang): rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/ dpag tshad bdun bcu yab ni tog bzangs yin/ snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/ sras po lnga legs sgra can ri mo gro ba// rnam par sprul pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can/ 
329b7(mdo bskal bzang): 'dus pa lan grangs brgya bcu kun la'ang / 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas mchog thob pa po// bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu bdun bdun yod/ mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/ rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas de/ 
329b8(mdo bskal bzang): chos dag/ lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i thugs rje chen po mtshungs med pa'i/ sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur/ mi'i 'dren pa snang bar mdzad pa'i// skye ba'i yul ni gaN+Di/ 
330a1(mdo bskal bzang): la/ brjid grags zhes bya/ rigs ni rgyal rigs srin te 'od kyi mang / rangag tu med pa'i ya ba ni stegs mthong yin/ ska bas thos zhes bu brgyas ba'i hUM/ sras blo mab+h+yaN+Dal drang cun rim
330a2(mdo bskal bzang): ba/ snang bar byed pa blo gros can yin te/ chags med gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can/ 'dus pa thun mong ma yin dpag tu med/ sangs rgyas chu brgya chu bcu rtsa dgu'i/ mdzod pa ji snyed de yis mang
330a3(mdo bskal bzang): bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten phan phyir sen snying po dag/ mya ngan 'das nas dam chos gnas 'gyur ba'i/ lo grangs stong phrag ni mtha' yang yas/ rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur// 
330a4(mdo bskal bzang): de skad ces bka' bstsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la leg so la gso bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ 
330a5(mdo bskal bzang): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang dang gang dag la/ dang phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bskur stir bgyis nas byang
330a6(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lung bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog du dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// mchog
330a7(mdo bskal bzang): tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar du leg so zhes
330a8(mdo bskal bzang): gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// / de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs
330b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa mi'i zla la/ gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gser las byas gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de
330b2(mdo bskal bzang): la/ sna ma'i me tog dgra gi 'brang phul nas/ dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'od srungs bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la/ sku rag
330b3(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni phul ba byas pa nas kyang / drang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// ngan sngon tshe sman par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la ni/ 'jams gang zhig gi dbul ba byas nas kya
330b4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i/ rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces byar gyur pa na/ bde gshegs mthu chen gdugs tshod dag la
330b5(mdo bskal bzang): spyan drangs nas/ dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa der snyan de la/ phyag dang khrod kyi lhan pa thal mo tsam phul
330b6(mdo bskal bzang): nos/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rab gsal tshong par gyur pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la/ nor bu rin chen dag ni phul nas kyi
330b7(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thang gzigs de la/ mu tig dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas
330b8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs me tog grong khyer brtan pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur de la/ la du dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang
331a1(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gnyis pa yis// bde gshegs mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal de la/ tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas
331a2(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs khyim bdag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sgra sgrogs la/ khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni phul nas
331a3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de dpon dag gis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa mthong de la// tsan dan dmar po khri'u dag cig phul nas kyang // 
331a4(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lag chen rol mo mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod grags gleng khyer du/ gshegs pa de la gling bus mchod nas kyang // dang po
331a5(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// bde gshegs stobs chen spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe// bde gshegs seng ge grong khyer gshegs pa ni/ a ka ru'i rdog ma phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
331a6(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rtsi sman shing rta mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs bu dri zhim de lA ni/ ting lo mar me bcas pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
331a7(mdo bskal bzang): de// bder gshegs snyan pa tha gra bar gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me glog 'gyur tshe// ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
331a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs tog zhing par gyur pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer lo// me tog silam dag gis gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'ong/ 
331b1(mdo bskal bzang): chen grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po ste// drang srong de la mar me phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs grol phung lha mkhan gyur pa/ 
331b2(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshungs pa'i dbyangs de la// mchil lham zung cig phul nas pa byas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rnam snang 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// 
331b3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis 'joms de la/ ta li ba ti brgya khri bzhi stong phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nyi snying bral ze'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
331b4(mdo bskal bzang): pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la// ko sha ta ka'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed de// bde gshegs zla ba gser 'gur bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhas
331b5(mdo bskal bzang): de la// rin po che'i stong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la// 
331b6(mdo bskal bzang): rtsa'i sgron ma dag ni phul byas nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bang gshegs bzangs nags tshal skung gyur/ tshwa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la// tsam pa ka'i me te// 
331b7(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegaso mya ngan med pa tshong dpon bus// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyisadz+dza 'jom la// kar ni ka'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
331b8(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs skar rgyal khyim bdog bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsid nas sman de la// nor bu rin cen mchil lha zung cig phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de gsheg rab/ 
332a1(mdo bskal bzang): gsal rgya mtshor song ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de la/ tsan dan dmar po'i gzims khri cig phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'phreng thogs khyim
332a2(mdo bskal bzang): bdag pur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la/ ka ka ni ya'i bdug spos gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni gser rtogs che// 
332a3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa tshugs pa med de la// me long gcig cig phul ba byas nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs don gzigs 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
332a4(mdo bskal bzang): 'od dpag med mdzod la// khang pa brtsegs pa stong snyed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde gshegs mar me spos ni 'bru mar 'tshong ba'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
332a5(mdo bskal bzang): par snang ba gang // bye ba drug bcu'i 'khor bcas dag la khrus gang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mthu ldan gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa/ 
332a6(mdo bskal bzang): rgyas de la// ras chos leb leb po dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sman pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan bral de la// spos kyi ril bu dag ni phul/ 
332a7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dris pa 'byur mar mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyogs 'dzes mdzad de la// mur me kha cig phul ba byas nas kyang / dang pi byang chub sbyin
332a8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed de// ba ga shegs mjed spu 'dri rgyud mkhan bu'i che// de bzhin go bye ba kun du gzigs de la// ud pal dmar po dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyad// bde gshegs brtan lnga/ 
332b1(mdo bskal bzang): sngas kyi 'khor los sbyar ba'i sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnan gyis mtho dwe la n+d+he/ rin gyirgya las nus pa'i drangan gyi grangs// brgyad bcucu bani dul nas kyang / dang byang chub ngu ni sems paskyed/ 
332b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs lnga dpal rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur dwa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po'i 'od dri la// nor bu rin can bla dpag tshad gcig snang ba// phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
332b3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs gdul dka' shing 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gsheg de la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin ga sh+ye
332b4(mdo bskal bzang): pa yon tan rgyal mtshan chu'i ni// sbyin bdag gyur tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong sras// de la chu snod dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bde gshegs sgra gcan 'phreng
332b5(mdo bskal bzang): rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/ gser gyi mchid lham zung cig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur
332b6(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rab dang ba la// khrus kyi cha ba dag phul ba byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs phyugs rdzir gyur pa'i tshe// 
332b7(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan dang por mngon rdzogs par sangs rgyas gyur pa'i tshon de la phye bre gang // phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs tshi ga brtan 'gren bu'i tshong ba'i tshe// de
332b8(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo gshegs pa la// 'gron bu slar gang gter te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bad ga sh+ye mi'i 'gying rgyal bu dag 'dod tshe// de bzhin ga sh+ya ba bkod pa mtha'
334a1(mdo bskal bzang): @#// yas la// klu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyedado// de gshegs 'od mdzad 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid brtsegs 'od la// nA bza' rin po
334a2(mdo bskal bzang): tshe dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po yis// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gnas de lda ni// me tog mya ngan tshang ba bdun phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyo/ 
334a3(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs rdo rje lha dbang brgya byin du gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la// me tog man 'da' ba'i char phab nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sdom can 'dzam gling gi/ rgyal por gyur
334a4(mdo bskal bzang): che bde gshegs thar dgyes la// goser las byas pa'i bla re phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mi bskyed so rol mo mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs
334a5(mdo bskal bzang): byin de la rol mo'i bkur sti rnga chen brdungs nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin can blo mchog gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i mdzod de la// spos kyis
334a6(mdo bskal bzang): bsgos pa'i 'phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde go shegs pang spyan 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/ khri'u gzangs
334a7(mdo bskal bzang): ga dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs stobs sde rgyal po'i sman+da pa tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon pa tshe ldan lo// skye du ri'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // 
334a8(mdo bskal bzang): stong po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs me tog 'od zer gser 'gar gyi// khur gyur chen bdag bye kun gzil// rin po che'i 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
334b1(mdo bskal bzang): shes dgyes byis pa'i brgyan byed tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yul phyogs kun mchod la// mig dang bdug pa dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs gzi chen tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// 
334b2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa 'o rab gsal de la// na badz+ra'i bla re dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ga shegs tshangs pa bag tshes mkhan du gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa bla ma la// 
334b3(mdo bskal bzang): rjernge ra'i ril bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa bla ma'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i 'od de la/ gdugs ni gcig gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang
334b4(mdo bskal bzang): pi byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs paklu byin phreng rgyud mo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam bsgyings la// me tog dag gi chun po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
334b5(mdo bskal bzang): bskyod do// bde gshegs brtan gshegs nor bu mkhan gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis slong de la// rin po che'i dra ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
334b6(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan mthong ba nad pa'i graso sman la/ sbyor ma'i sra bur gyur che na dge slong dge 'dun dag/ spyan drangs nad sman sbyar nas bde gshegs legs mthong lo/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
334b7(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs brtson 'grus sbyin pa 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe// tsan dan dmar po dag las gtsug lag khang brgya stong // byas te ras bcos g.yogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa po// bdud rtsi'i stobs la dang po
334b8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bzang skyong gis ni bde gshegs bzla ba'i 'od/ nyan thos bcas pa'i dge 'dun 'khor ldan khri phrag bcu// zhag bdun par du zhal zas ro ni brgyad// 
335a1(mdo bskal bzang): ldan pas tshim par mdzad de dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rga po gsal chen bram ze'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod grags la// yub nor bus bslus pa'i rdzal
335a2(mdo bskal bzang): cig/ phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs po chi med rgyal po yi/ be nyar gyur te bder gshegs dpal sbas la/ ba na cha'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
335a3(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// 'der gshegs seng ge'i rgyal mtshon zhing pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro gsal de la/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rgyal ba
335a4(mdo bskal bzang): tshul gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med 'khor lo la/ a ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu nr-i sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dga' ba'i che// 
335a5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i nga ro la// rgyal mtshan dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mchog dag rgyal po spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs
335a6(mdo bskal bzang): pa ye shes mchod rten la// phye ma slar gang gtor te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la// 
335a7(mdo bskal bzang): pa la pa ta gsum zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdir gshegs dag gshegs rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe// dri bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la// dungul gyi me tog dag ni phul
335a8(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lho tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dpag med la// lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
335b1(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan lag ni rtse ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni// 'chags khru brgyad khor yug bkram nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs spos klung smos
335b2(mdo bskal bzang): 'tshong bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa rnam grol gyi// 'chag sa spos kyi chu yis chag chag btab// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rnam grol gzigs ni gos 'tshed gyur pa'i tshe// de
335b3(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med de la// me tog gi ni gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dad po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'brag sgra rdza mkhan gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i skabs de la// 
335b4(mdo bskal bzang): spos dang ril ba gcig cig phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs legs sems khye'u lo gsum lon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rnam gzigs la// pad+ma dag ni dbul ba
335b5(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yid bzangs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal byin de la ni// sna ma'i me tog phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub
335b6(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dri med tha ga par gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs mthong de la ni// 'ba' sha ko cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bi de
335b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshogs zla ba gling chen 'dul ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni// me tog phreng ba khru gang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs grags chen grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ 
335b8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros grags de la/ me tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs phyug na nor bu khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod de la// swa rdal slar
336a1(mdo bskal bzang): gang dbul ba byas nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul lha'i bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sla ba'i 'od de la// lha'i gzhal med khang cig phul nas kyang // dang po
336a2(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs seng stabs gdugs mkhan gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar par bzhud de la// tshad pa'i dus tshe lo ma'i gdugs phub nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedo// 
336a3(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod de la// lam gyi shing drung dag tu be'u rus phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rnam rgyal ba lang rdzi'i tshe// 
336a4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la// lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shes rab rtsegs pa dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
336a5(mdo bskal bzang): tog de la/ nyin cig rangs par chos kyi bdan phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegase logs gnas lham 'khan gyur pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba'i blo de la/ 
336a6(mdo bskal bzang): mchil lham rim pa gcig pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i blo gros la// ro dang ldan pa'i btung
336a7(mdo bskal bzang): ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs yan log skyes ni mi 'dzin tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni// khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // drang
336a8(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa ni// lam ston gyur tshe bder gshegs bden smra la// shing drung gnas mal dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 
336b1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzangs sde dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa skar dbyangs de la ni// me tog ud pal lnga zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs mkhyen ldan 'gon
336b2(mdo bskal bzang): gnas dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de'i// 'chags byi dor dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs 'od zer shing rta mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
336b3(mdo bskal bzang): pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la// nyal khri stong ri ba dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa brtul shugs brtan pa ni// 'phreng rgyud mkhan tshe bder gshegs yid 'ong
336b4(mdo bskal bzang): sems// de la me tog bla re phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// de bzhin gshegs pA bkra shis shing thun che// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i shing rta la// bu yug langs tshe snang ma bltam
336b5(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden rtog khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog la/ kha gdong bkru ba phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po
336b6(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni semaso bskyed do/ bder gshegs pad+ma tshod dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la// pad+ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de
336b7(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa sred mong bu ni spos tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bar dka' zhes bya ba yi// khang pa rtsegs pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs/ 
336b8(mdo bskal bzang): pa lag bzangs rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan sgrogs par mdzad pa gang // 'khor bcas bye ba dag la chos gos phul nas ni// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs
337a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa ye shes 'byung gnas ni// tshan po cher gyur g.yul ngor chas pa'i tshe// bder gshegs legs mthong la ni rgyal mtshan cig/ phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro sman
337a2(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa skye'i mchod rten la// spos kyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs byin lam ston tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya la// 
337a3(mdo bskal bzang): de la lam dag mtshon par byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ro gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas nyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzi ba med gshegs de nyan thos 'khor bcas bye ba bsgral nas kyang / 
337a4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ra gshegs lha'i me tog nor bu mkhan gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la// nor bu rin chen smras pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
337a5(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs don legs rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung snyan de la ni// nor bu rin chen bla smras pa'i bla re phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ra gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug shing mkhan
337a6(mdo bskal bzang): gyi// byur gyur tshe na bder gshegs skar 'od kyi/ gshegs zam dag ni bsham pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs blo grags kun dga' ru srung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
337a7(mdo bskal bzang): zla ba'i sgron de la// mon sran gre'u'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spos brtsegs tshing ba'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog de// sbyin pa phun su
337a8(mdo bskal bzang): tshogs pas spyan drangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rdor rje rgyal mtshan gyi// tshal gyi las byad che na de bzhin gshegs// bsod nams bkod de la ni aM pra phul/ dang po
337b1(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa phan zhing grong dpon gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od ches byas pa las// nyin gcig srog gcod spang ba'i bslab bzhi mnos
337b2(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rnam grol grong rdal byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la// lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang / 
337b3(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mun dang bral ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa srid mthar gzigs nga la// sran gri'i 'bru mar mar me gzhag phul nas// dad pa byang chub tu ni sems
337b4(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// ba~M der gshegs sgra can lha'i gong rten che/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba gzigs de la/ hra sta ba ru ka dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshigs ri bo'i
337b5(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal mtshan tshogs ldan gyi// khye'ur gyur tshe bder gshegs mtha' yas 'ong // de la me tog chun po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tshogs can 'od ni 'phrang rgyud tshe// de
337b6(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs de la// me tog las byas bla re phul nas kyang // dang po che byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen snying po khrus byed che// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs
337b7(mdo bskal bzang): gsung ba la// kha rdong bkru ba dbul bar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bid ro gshegs shin tu 'thor gshegs grong khyer rten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims stobs de
337b8(mdo bskal bzang): grong khyer du// gshegs pa'i tshe na bad na dag bshoms te bting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde re gshegs skar rgyal nur mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la// zhal
338a1(mdo bskal bzang): zas bcas pa rnams ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ru rings gzhan gyis 'khrel 'gyur tshe// de bzhin gangashegs pa gzi brjid dga' da la// lhung bzang 'dzas kyis
338a2(mdo bskal bzang): bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ra gshegaM swa yon tan grags pa bsod snyoms tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas pa// gos kyi ras ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas// dang
338a3(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs po nyi zla ba der gshegs srid sbyin tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor bcas bya ba sum bcu dag la gtsug lag khang // bzang por long spyad phyir dang dpag tshad/ 
338a4(mdo bskal bzang): bcu'i gos/ gding ba phul nas byang chub sems bskyed// bder gshegs nya 'od gzhan gyi khol gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i tshe de la/ lcags kyi snod dag dbul bar byas kyang // dang po byang
338a5(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs skar mkhan tshong ba'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gsal de la ni/ nor bu rin chen dpag tshad gcig 'dra ldan// phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
338a6(mdo bskal bzang): do// de bzhin gang shagos pa sang dog dad dpon bya// bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gang shegs pa po// blo gros bzang la 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bsnyad do// de bzhin gshags pa des mkhan rgyal
338a7(mdo bskal bzang): po ni// snyan ngags mkhan tshe bder gshegs tsam mchog la// tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po yis// gzhan
338a8(mdo bskal bzang): gyis dge 'dun bshos gos phul la ring nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa 'tshal dag gi las byed chen de/ 
338b1(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gsheg pa po// khyad par sems la chub rtsang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// badrer gshegs klog 'od rngon pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs bu dpa' bo'i sems de la// 
338b2(mdo bskal bzang): rtsa'i stan dag dbul bar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ges byin pa khyim dag gi/ bur gyur che na bder gshegs pad snying la/ sna ma'i me tog yod pa'i sa gzhi phul/ 
338b3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsnyad do// bder gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan gyis// 'jims bcas lam du 'gron pa'i bsil byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu la ni/ dang po byang chub
338b4(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gaushegs mchog dga' grags pa bu ram shing // 'chir 'gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// blo rnams 'byed la bu ram bcud khu byung // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
338b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs brtson 'grus brtan pa bram ze'i bur gyur tshe// bder gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la// khrus rkyen dga' ba'i cha la dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ro gsheg glags
338b6(mdo bskal bzang): rdzogs chang tshor bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la// lo ma'i snod las chu dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bsnyegs bral rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe// 
338b7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i nga ro la/ lo ma'i snod nas bar sha'i me tog phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mchod 'os lha ni blo na mchog gyur pa'i tshe// bder gshegs yid
338b8(mdo bskal bzang): 'ong blo 'od dag la dpag tshad gcig/ khor yug tsam gyi skyed mos tshal du la a ka ru'i// bdug pas bdugs te/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sgron chen mi bkren gyur pa'i tshe/ 
339a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od de la// rtsa'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'jig rten 'od na lha'i bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba
339a2(mdo bskal bzang): 'od de la// me tog man da ra ba'i gdugs phul nas/ dang pi byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spos dri zhom pas gang gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes de la// khrus ras dag ni
339a3(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan mchog 'dzin sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med do na la/ bdug pa dang ni dar yug phul nas kyang // dang // 
339a4(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mun dang rnam bral rgyal po'i// 'dun 'don bur gyur chen de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom gzi la mu tig brgyan 'phreng dag/ phul nas dang po byang chub
339a5(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'gram pa yis de bzhin gshegs pa de na grub blo da la/ 'dam rdza ba dag tu shing zam btsugs nas phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
339a6(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs rin chen grags pa spros 'tshong gi/ bur gyur tshe na bder gshegs dbyangs mnga' la// phye ma slar gang dag ni gter phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskrad do// bdar gshegs skyom
339a7(mdo bskal bzang): rub zhi ba rgyal bu'i tshe// bsad bya btsun drag 'bros su bcug nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pas mchog de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bdud rtsi 'chang bgreng dpon tshe// 
339a8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni// bye dUr+ya'i gdugs stong dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mi zla 'phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sanges pasas/ 
339b1(mdo bskal bzang): de la// ud pa la'i 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa ni// mdun dpon tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// bden par gsung ba de la 'phreng ba
339b2(mdo bskal bzang): phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ra ga shegs rab brgyan grong khyer la brten pa'i// bur gyur tshe na bder gshegs mdangs 'od kyi// grong khyer sgo dag mdzes par byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub
339b3(mdo bskal bzang): du ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nor 'od brgya bin gyur pa'i tshe// bad ra gshegs gzi brjid ma tig rgyas pa la// dpag tshad khor yug me tog char phab nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de
339b4(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung nas kyi/ bder gshegs grags tog shes rab pha rol phyin// gsung tshe legs gsungs zhes ni yi rang phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
339b5(mdo bskal bzang): don nges ldan pa thag par/ gyur tshe gder gshegs yon tan+da gsal ba la/ ras kyi kha char dgo ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tshe sbyin glo chen gyur pa'i tshe/ 
339b6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron de la// bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas bcu mkhan tsho// de bzhin gshegs
339b7(mdo bskal bzang): pa gsal rab dpal de la// mi tog snyi pa bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa rdza mkhan tshe// dri bzhin gshegs pa zhal sdug sde bdags
339b8(mdo bskal bzang): snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs stobs gshegs zhing pa'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs bzhud pa/ zam stegs
340a1(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni gzugs pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs blo gnas shing srungs gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i mchod rten la// se'u 'bru dag da
340a2(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gdugs mdzes blon po'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i blo de la/ tsam pa'i me tog 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // 
340a3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tso bo gser ma kha ra tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po la// bdug pas bdugs pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
340a4(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shin tu 'phags pa spos 'tshong gyi// bur gyur chen de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde'i// 'chags spos chus chag chag btab nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
340a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs seng ge'i sgra ni rnga mkhan tshe// bder gshegs sa la'i rgyal po de la ni// rnga bo che dag bdung ba byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdar gshegs rnam po rol ldan pa dang 'obud 'khan
340a6(mdo bskal bzang): gyur tshe// bde par gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po de/ grong khyer gshegs tshe dung dag bus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// / bam po nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa klu/ 
340a7(mdo bskal bzang): 'di zla ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dga' de la// rnga bo che dag bdung ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog rig po gar mkhan bur gyur tshe// bad par gsheg pa
340a8(mdo bskal bzang): dbang ba zhi de la/ spyan sngar bro gar dag gis mchod nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder ga shegs kyu dga' gar mkhan bur gyur che// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'di la// rol mo'i sgra dag
340b1(mdo bskal bzang): bsgrags nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i// sras mor gyur che de bzhin gshegs pa po// pad kar spos la mu tig rgyan 'phreng phu la// dang po byang chub
340b2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyod// bder gshegs shin tu grags pa tshong dpon gyi// chung mar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// lhun po'i 'od zer spyi bor bla re phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdir gshegs
340b3(mdo bskal bzang): stobs lnga grong khyer bstan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la/ bshes dron lhung bzed bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'phreng ldan/ 
340b4(mdo bskal bzang): gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa bsgyings ldan bzhud de la// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal thal mo ldan gsum sbyar// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa klu lag grong khyer gyi// sgo srung tshe na
340b5(mdo bskal bzang): phyag dar byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnams lha de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mig rgyan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od de la// chu dang skyu ru ra/ 
340b6(mdo bskal bzang): dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems skye // bder gshegs tshul khrims ldan pa snga dro zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbyangs pa'i blos dga' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
340b7(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zil non ye shes kyis// ngan 'gror 'gro ba tshul khrims la bkod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
340b8(mdo bskal bzang): mtha' yas spyan ni gos 'chang che// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la// ras bcos bla re dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs bden skyong khyim bdag bur gyur/ 
341a1(mdo bskal bzang): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson grus bden de la// me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs dul nAs// drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs nyi 'od bcas mkhan bur tshe// de bzhin ga sh+ye paH/ 
341a2(mdo bskal bzang): 'is mchod de la// la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// dri bzhin gshegs pa des blo bzang mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas blo de la/ gding ba dag ni dbul ba
341a3(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang pi byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gau shegs mtha' yas gzugs ni shing rta mkhan tshe// gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi la// ba la shi ka dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
341a4(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad khar ba mkhan// gyur tshe bder gshegs mi'i gzi byin la// me long cig cig phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder
341a5(mdo bskal bzang): rin chen tog ni nor bu mkhan// gyur tshe bder gshegs bsod nams stegs bzangs la// nor bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs the tsom spangs pa rgyal
341a6(mdo bskal bzang): po'i// btsun mor gyur tshe bde rwa gshegs brtan la/ me tog skyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdar gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa mang mi gar/ gyur tshe bder gsheg/ 
341a7(mdo bskal bzang): thub par grags de la// dbu nu cig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdor gshegs don yod nom gnon mi mjed bdag/ tshangs che bder gshegs grags pa'i rgyal mtshan la
341a8(mdo bskal bzang): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// de bzhin gshegs pa gtogs par mdzad pa pos// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la// spos kyi ril bu dag ni phul
341b1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog rgyal mtshan rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gsal re la// rtsa'is bkab pa'i khang bzangs phul nas kyang // dang po byung
341b2(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ri dbang rgyal po 'dregs mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid che de'i// dbu sgra legs par breg pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
341b3(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs gzi brjid mkhan po 'bru mAr mkhan// gyur tshe bder gshegs dgra bcom mchod 'os kyi// gtsug lag khang du spos bskor 'bru mar phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gau sh+ya
341b4(mdo bskal bzang): don mdzad gzigs pa til pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchog de la// lhang tsher le ba leb po dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdar gshegs grags pa mtha' yus 'jo
341b5(mdo bskal bzang): lor sgyur gyur tshwa/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sems dpa' de la ni// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gdugs stong phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lnga
341b6(mdo bskal bzang): ni 'dzam gling gi/ rgyal por gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgos mchod la/ 'bras bu'i skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa don gan/ 
341b7(mdo bskal bzang): mkhyen pa chang rlung gi/ byur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyad// srang du gsheg so tshe thal me sbyar nas phyag byas nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa blo rdzogs rgyal
341b8(mdo bskal bzang): bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rab dang la// me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mya ngan med pa dga' bo'i tshe// de bzhin ga
343a1(mdo bskal bzang): pad+mo gros sems dranga'ade/ 'jigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bram yis// sems can kun la yud tsam byas pa
343a2(mdo bskal bzang): bsgoms byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa nges 'byung blo de la// dang po byang chub tu nI sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa shing drung tshangs lha shing drungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po dbyangs de la/ 
343a3(mdo bskal bzang): bu rAm shing gi sdong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dbang phyug ni/ dge slong gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// sna tshogs gsung ba'i chos dag
343a4(mdo bskal bzang): bting nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs me tog spyan ni rgyal po'i// mir gyur tshon bder gshegs 'byug sgra la/ ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po
343a5(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// ba der gshegs 'byed sku ni btsa bslag 'khan/ gyur tshe bder gshegs 'od chen phung po'i// na bzang dag ni bkru ba gal byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu na sras bskyed// 
343a6(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'od kyis ni grong dag dang // yul 'khor rnams su pha rol drug sgra bsgrags nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rtsegs de la yang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 5
343a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs kun gzigs stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// rtswa gra lag khang mchog bye ba drug cu byed bcug nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med par dga' de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// 
343a8(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs yon tan 'od gsal phyag dar bar// gyur tshe bder gshegs yul 'khor lho nga la// rdo lab bdan dag dbul bar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
343b1(mdo bskal bzang): pazla zhal bram ze'i bur gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dga' ba'i dbyungs de la// kan ta ra'i me tog dag ni gtor nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rin che
343b2(mdo bskal bzang): 'od ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la// rin po che'i sgron ma phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen trog ni lcags mkhan tshe// de
343b3(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' de la// ljags bzhar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa glags bla chang tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
343b4(mdo bskal bzang): sgron ma'i rgyal ba la/ 'dzam bu'i ro bro dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'od byed tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi tog de la/ 
343b5(mdo bskal bzang): mu shi ka ga shi'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzi' brjod dpag med 'phreng gyur tshe// dri bzhin gshegs pa sa phyogs rnam grags la// pad
343b6(mdo bskal bzang): ma 'dab brgya' pa dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen gos 'ching tsho/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sgrog de la ni/ ras yug dag
343b7(mdo bskal bzang): ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ge'i sku ni spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de la/ spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang
343b8(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde rag shigs mkhas blo tshogs dngon khol pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med sbyin de la/ me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub
344a1(mdo bskal bzang): \u0f7f// tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal dka' rgyu bu'i ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/ me tog man dA ra ba dul nas kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
344a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po ni// rdul chen lta bu'i bram ze'i gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lho de la// 'phreng phul dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zla tog/

344a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa grags pa ched la// rgyun shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mtha' rtsal mtha' yas tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa/

344a6(mdo bskal bzang): ud pa la chag pa gang zhig phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med tshong dpon gyi/ bu che de bzhin gshegs pa grags bla la/ me tog 'bar shi skye ba'i sa gzhi
344a7(mdo bskal bzang): dul no// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs don kyang gzigs pa dedang dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la/ mu tig gi ni 'phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub du ni
344a8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs po dpa' bo spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa da mar ser 'dadi de la// tsan dan ngag gi bdan khri phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod // 'dzir/ 
344b1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs 'byor ldan tshong ngus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'dud de la/ snyun rkyen gsos sman mang dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
344b2(mdo bskal bzang): bsod nams ba~M lang rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo glos sems de la/ snod dag zhe yis bkong ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sgron ma lngas byed che//

344b6(mdo bskal bzang): phrag brgya ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha shing 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal de la ni/ rtsa'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po
344b7(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bad+mar gshegs yid gnyis spong ba gser mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid sel mdzad de la// gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
344b8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bder gshegs 'dzin pa dpag med gser rtog che// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dpal de la// gser ni slar gang gtor te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
345a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa mchog sred sded dpon gyi// bu che de bzhin gshegs pa rtso mchog la// gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs
345a2(mdo bskal bzang): pachos med lcags mgar me/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la// a ha ha ka dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mig gnas grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de
345a3(mdo bskal bzang): bar gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/ me tog rangs pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa des gnas thags mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzig/

345a5(mdo bskal bzang): 'i 'ubru mar me phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ra gshegs 'gro ba'i 'od gzer los sgyur ba'i tshe// bder gshegs shing rta chen po 'khor bcas bya stong la// rgyal po'i zhal
