348a3(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs smos grags tshong pa'i khol po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan la// lan cha srang 'ga' zhig ni dbul ba byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin/ 
348a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu'i swa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i tog de la// tshod snod chang ba gang zhig bsod snyoms phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ru gshegros tshe dpag che/ 
348a5(mdo bskal bzang): med ni sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu de la/ mig sman ril la dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde ra ga shegros nor bu bkod pa khye'u'i// de bzhin/ 
348a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa rin chen gsal ba'i// lam srad tu me tog kar pre phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang chen gyad kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dgongs
348a7(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ ko dra ba'i 'bru dag phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs sems de la ni// ril bragaci
348a8(mdo bskal bzang): cig phul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags pa yis// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dag la rdzing phul nas// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros
348b1(mdo bskal bzang): bzang po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa lha bu'i tshe// bder gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas byang chub snying por ni/ snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe na
348b2(mdo bskal bzang): sor mo lnga bsregs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdar gshegs ma smad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa song ge'i phyag de la/ lo ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas
348b3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs glang po'i 'gros ni grong khyer na/ rten pa'i tshe na bder gshegs blo snang la// sha ma ka dog dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub
348b4(mdo bskal bzang): hU~M ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yid 'thad gnag lhas srung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la/ da ra ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
348b5(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs rin chen zla ba lam sten tshe/ bder gshegs bden pa'i tog gi lam dag tu// gos kyi bdan dag bting ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhi nog
348b6(mdo bskal bzang): bzhi pa sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas de la// ud pa la'i bkrus sman phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs rab gsal rgyal gyi
348b7(mdo bskal bzang): slong brtson pa// dge slong chen bde gshegs dpag med pa'i// lha la oM gang dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// badror gshegs kha lo sgyur ba ded dpon na/ 
348b8(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i me tog la/ tsan dan dmar po'i khang bzangs dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bider gshegs dga' ba'i dang daphyug phyug po'i che/ 
349a1(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin chen po la// rol mo'i sgra'i sa mchod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gtsug na rin chen rtsis pa yis// khye'u tshe na/ 
349a2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa tog chen la// mtshungs pa'i phye ma dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs bral rtsa 'tsheng tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
349a3(mdo bskal bzang): nyi ma'i 'od de la// ka ba di ta'i phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sgra gcan lho ni shing 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od de la// rtsa las byas pa'i
349a4(mdo bskal bzang): mchis lham phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs na tshod bzang po gring srung tshe// grong khyer dag gi sgo ni phye nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya'i nga rol// 
349a5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam rgyal la// shi ri sha'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
349a6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen phung po sman 'tshong ma'i tshe// gtso bo tsha na bde gshegs 'byor 'od la// na bA me lA'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
349a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs mdzes gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni mtha' ya sa~M lA/ ud pa la ni gcig cig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
349a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs seng ge phyogs ni bco smag mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bstan par dgyes de'i/ ni bza' bkyu ba shal dag ni byas nas kyang / dang pi byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
349b1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs shin tu 'thor gshegs glang po'i rdzi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bder gshegs kyi/ gan ni 'ab ti shing drung bting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdar gshegs skye
349b2(mdo bskal bzang): dbang grong khyer brtan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la// dre ka na'i me tog gter nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs blo gros bzang po grong khyer dang
349b3(mdo bskal bzang): po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gshegs de la// a 'bra'i lcug ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni spos 'tshong che// 
349b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la// spros rnams dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni se mos bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen gzi brjid bram ze'i// de bzhin gshegs
349b5(mdo bskal bzang): pa blo zab de la ni/ bal dang 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skal ldan shing rta rtsa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sde'i 'gru
349b6(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ me tog chun po drag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs kyan rgyal khrul 'khor mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de
349b7(mdo bskal bzang): la/ dar gyi lnga ldi dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dka' ba bkod pa tshong dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po
349b8(mdo bskal bzang): la// 'o mar bcas pa'i 'bras rnams phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa stegs ni mdzad pa po// shing rta mkhan tshe bder gshegs ba gyes / 
350a1(mdo bskal bzang): shing las byas pa'i 'tshal lam phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sbas kyi glang po khyim bdag tshes de bzhin gshegs pa mthu brtsal chen po gag rma bya'i
350a2(mdo bskal bzang): bsil yab dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs blo gros 'od 'phro rgyal po yi/ btsun mo'i tshe na bde gshegs rgyal sde pa/ me tog par shi chag pa gang phul
350a3(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ri bo'i rgyal mtshan khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grwa ra gshegs de la/ lag pa 'dag pa'i chal dag phul nas kyang // 
350a4(mdo bskal bzang): dang ngo byang chub tu sems bskye do// de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzangs tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug de laM// me tog chun pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sem skyes
350a5(mdo bskal bzang): bde gshegs chos bstan nor bu mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la// rin po che'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs bzi
350a6(mdo bskal bzang): brjid drag shul gser 'gar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gsal de la// gser gyi me tog dag ni rtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bder gshegs chos kyi nor
350a7(mdo bskal bzang): bu ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po la// mu tig dmar po dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bde gshegs bzang byin grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/ 
350a8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid me tog la// tha shos dron bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskye // dogashegs zla ba 'phreng ba rgyud mkhan tshe// de bzhin gabye
350b1(mdo bskal bzang): gzi brjid phung po la// u dpal lnga zhig gtong ba byas nas/ dang po byang chub tu sems bskye // bde gshegs tshad dbyangs lag par byed pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul 'od de la// choms shing
350b2(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni dbul ba byas nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs song gi zla ba rgyal po yi// pho nya byed tshe bde gshegs gza' mtha' yas// de la 'chil lham dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po bya
350b3(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed ka bde gshegs dpal ni tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la// gser gyi 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sem skyed// de bzhin
350b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa leg so bskyed gser 'gar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po la// rin po che'i sdong po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs thub med tshogs ni 'dun dpom
350b5(mdo bskal bzang): pur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad grags pa la// sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i 'o ma dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs grags pa'i gshes gnyen
350b6(mdo bskal bzang): ded dpon gyi// bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs den rtog la// me tog dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa 'phreng rgyud tshe/ de bzhin ga
350b7(mdo bskal bzang): pa gzi brjid drag shul la/ me tog chag pa gang zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bder gshegs rko thub chen po tshong dpon cho// / de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de
350b8(mdo bskal bzang): la/ 'khor rnams tha~Md dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshogs lhun po'i 'od zer 'khor gyur rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhini gshegs pa ldan po chen po de la ni
351a1(mdo bskal bzang): rin chen yu ba bcas pa'i rdzogs 'bum phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa ded dpon bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa bkod pa
351a2(mdo bskal bzang): de la ni// rin chen snam bu lnga ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mched grags rtsal chen lta bu'i bram ze'i tshe// 'khor ni bye bar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa po// 
351a3(mdo bskal bzang): 'jig rten rnam par grags pa khrus kyi yo byad phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa chos grags lam sngon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul byin pa yi// 'chag sa dag ni phyag dar
351a4(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'od dpa' bo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu grags de la// rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang
351a5(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bizhin ga shegs paM glog 'byin grong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la// lding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de
351a6(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/ sbrang rtsir bcas bcas pa'i 'bras chan phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
351a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs 'tshe byed lha ris pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa po de yi/ gtsug lag khang gi phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs na tshod bzang po rtsa 'tsheng tshe/ bde
351a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs zil gyis mi gnon grags pa la// rtsa'i sgren ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdi gshegs legs pa'i tshogs can 'khor sgyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs
351b1(mdo bskal bzang): dgra bcom 'od de la// na bza' rin po che dag dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rnam nges blo gros tshong dpon gyi// dbu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sgron chen la// mu kha tshan
351b2(mdo bskal bzang): hra kad gaphul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos// rim gro ba tshe bde gshegs blos skyed la// chos kyi bdan dag bshams pa byas nas kyis
351b3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rgyal bas dgyes pa gos 'tsheng tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal can de la// chos gros gsum dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
351b4(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sing ge'i 'od zer lam sngon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med gzigs pa po// lam du zhugs tshe bskor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder
351b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs rnam par snang mdzad rin po che// rtogs shes tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// yid gnyis spong ba'i 'chag sa bshams nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs
351b6(mdo bskal bzang): ba grags mchog spos 'tshod tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs che de la// sna ma'i me tog chun po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs thugs rab gzhungs
351b7(mdo bskal bzang): la phyag dar ba'i// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal la// mngon gsum dag tu bstod pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nor bu zla ba lta ba'i tshe// de bzhin
351b8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa 'khrul med gshegs de la/ lha'i gzhal med khang dag phul nas keng / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs drag shul 'od zer dgon pa yi// dge slong chen bde
353a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs yul 'khor lha// de la chos gos snum phyar phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs brtul zhugs thub med rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par
353a2(mdo bskal bzang): rgyas de la// gdugs dang dar yug dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gros mchod rdol bu'i tshe// nyi ma 'ga' zhig bslab pa lnga mnos nas// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dag
353a3(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nor bu'i tshogs ni brgya byin te// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin de la// gser gyi shing rta rkyen bcas stong snyed phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de
353a4(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bla ma bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha rgad la ni// ma 'ad+hu ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs glang chen seng ge long ba'i tshe// de bzhin
353a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa thar pa'i 'od de yi// 'chag sa dag ni chag chag btab nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe// zla ba bzhir ni dge slong na ba yi// gso sman dag la
353a6(mdo bskal bzang): spyan grangs bde gshegs 'od 'phro la// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin chen 'od zer 'khor lo sgyur ba yi// btsun me chen bde gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas la// yu ba nor bus smras pa'i
353a7(mdo bskal bzang): yob phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs sgra gcan skyod pa tshan chen tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i blo de ni// lam du zhugs tshe bsil ba'i rlung g.yab pas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde
353a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs yon tan brgyam tsho gro'i rda'i gyi/ byis pa chen bde gshegs byang chub 'ong// de la tshems shing dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni se mas bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer ldan pa tshong dpon gyi// bu che de bzhin gshes/ 
353b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa brgya mtsho la// mar me kha ni stong snyed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs rab tu zhi stabs gyang gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dgyes de la// nor bus smras pa'i 'chil lam phul
353b2(mdo bskal bzang): nas ni// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bod gshegs 'jig rten bzang po spos 'i cheng bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen de la phye ma yis// bkang po'i ni bza' dang ni pad+ma phul bas ni// dang po byang chub tu ni ses
353b3(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bde gau shegs mya ngan med pa gso 'tshed khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo ni zab mi de la'ang // rdzi char byung ba'i tshe na me tog dag gi gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs
353b4(mdo bskal bzang): bshugs bcu rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi dbang phyug can// lam du zhugs tshe bdun dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs stobs dgyes rol me mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin
353b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa rtsi chen de la ni/ dung sgra dag ni 'bud pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mthu dpal rol mo klu mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de la// gsum la skyabasu
353b6(mdo bskal bzang): 'gro ba mnos nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// dri bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob ma nyan pa'i tshe// chu bo dag la zam pa btsugs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems
353b7(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa 'khrul med la// khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs yon tan snying po tshong dpon gyi/ 
353b8(mdo bskal bzang): bu tshe bde gshegs bsod nams 'phags pa la// d+hanA skar ri'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bden spyod smos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha'i bu grags la// spos kyir
354a1(mdo bskal bzang): lu dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dge mchog rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgon chen rgyal bu sangs rgyas de la sogs// dge slong dge 'dun spyan ni drangs
354a2(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa snang rgyal shing mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan pa// bde gshegs de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder
354a3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs 'od zer chen po tshal gri las// byed tshe bde gshegs lha'i 'od zer la// ljon pa'i tshon dag sbyar te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'od rdza mkhan tshe// bde gshegs 'od
354a4(mdo bskal bzang): gsel de la zla ba bzhir// bum pa chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yon tan rgya chen nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dges de la// lcags kyi snod dag
354a5(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs rin po che'i tshong dpon gyi// bu tshe ba der gshegs seng ge'i blo gros la// mu tig dag ni chun phreng phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 
354a6(mdo bskal bzang): de bo zhin gshegs pa dpal 'od tshong dpon gyi// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pas rtsol// phye mas bkang ba'i ud pal na bza' bul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs ge cha bgos pa lta bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs/ 
354a7(mdo bskal bzang): ba rin chen 'od de la// bsnyed pa dag gis bskyed pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng ge'i phyag ni tshal gyi las// byed tshe bde gshegs 'od zer bzang po la// me tog dag gi phu ram phul nas kyang // 
354a8(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang po yig 'khan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la// glo ba'i glegs ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin
354b1(mdo bskal bzang): chen mthon po shal khyer tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgeg de la// mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rgya mtsho rol mo mkhan gyi tshe// rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang // de bzhin
354b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzin 'gar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la// mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
354b3(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bde gshegs don gro lta bu nyi ma'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med de la// me tog man+ta ra ba gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin
354b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa grags bla bzhud pa na/ 'dam rta ba dag tu rdol ba zam btsugs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan tshogs ni sman pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la// skyu ru ra
354b5(mdo bskal bzang): 'bras bu gcig ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs rin chen mi ni ded dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lha de la/ bai dUr+ya'i snod chus bkang ste phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni
354b6(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed do// brider gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa tshong 'dus pa/ byed che dge 'dun dag la 'od sgron phul// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po la// deng po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'jig
354b7(mdo bskal bzang): rten zla ba 'khor sgyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan blo de la// rgyu ga lag khang ni stong sted phul nas kyang / dang be byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs steng rgyal po bram ze'i tshe// phyogs
354b8(mdo bskal bzang): bzhi'i dge 'dun dag gi bsam gtan khang brtsigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog mi de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs rtog bram ze'i tshe// de byinan ga shes
355a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa 'jig rten dga'ade la/ ku sha'i na bza' dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs tshogs chen rtse bo bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med la/ ril ta/ 
355a2(mdo bskal bzang): chu'i bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs seng skabs gling gcig rgyal po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog de la// ras chos lding ba dpag tshad gcig pa phul// dang po byang
355a3(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs drag shul byin ni tshong dpon gyi// chung ma chen bder gshegs nyi 'od la// phye ma slar gang dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chos kyi dbang
355a4(mdo bskal bzang): phyug 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od zer la// me tog chal par bkram pa slar gang kun phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdor gshegs gzi brjid 'od ni lta bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
355a5(mdo bskal bzang): pa ston par rgyas pa po// byang chub snying por phyin tshe rtsa bdun phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'od zer chen po khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsad par dgyes de la// ras bcos
355a6(mdo bskal bzang): bye ma snyed ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin che ni grags pa rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi 'od zer la// bla re spos can dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
355a7(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed do// bdir gshegs rin chen gsal ba rin chen tshor ba'i me// de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed rnams 'byung gnas des ni/ rin po mi dag slar ba bkung ste phul nas ni// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
355a8(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs grags pa mtha' yas ded dpon gyi// bu che bder gshegs me tog dpal de la// na bza'i bla re dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs 'od zer de na yang rgya mtsho'i tshong ba'i tshe/ 
355b1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phyag ldan de la ni// mu tig dmar pos slar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs lha'i drang srong drang srong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma la// 
355b2(mdo bskal bzang): lom dag gi gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs skye dbang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od zel// gling bzhi dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub
355b3(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dge 'dun brtan pa mtha' khob rgyal po che// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan de la ni// me tog stong snyed phul ba'i 'chag sa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
355b4(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzangs gser 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la// gser gyi glegs bam bkram pa'i 'chags phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
355b5(mdo bskal bzang): tog gi gser mkhan khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i nyi ma la// mar me bzang po bshams te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yul 'khor me tog rtsa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gabye
355b6(mdo bskal bzang): pa brtson 'grus brten de la// 'chags rtsa yis khyabs par bklamA nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs chos kyi blo gros tshong dus pa'i tshe// tshong dus pa'i srang dag phyags nas kyang / 
355b7(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa blo'i 'od ldan de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rlung shugs ltar gshegs ting du khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa de la ni// bsil yab dag
355b8(mdo bskal bzang): gis g.yab pa dag ni phul ba byas nas ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs legs bsams grags pa gtar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i blo de la// nor bu skar 'od dag ni hu
356a1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sdang ldan rgyal po'i pho nya tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dpag tshad la// lan gsum dag ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub
356a2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa lha tshogs 'khor sgyur blon mchog tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba la// gser dang byi ru dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshes
356a3(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan bsrungs pa 'gron pa'i tshe// lam srang dag tu rdo stegs btsugs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mthu rdul la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs don gyi blo gros lha mchog
356a4(mdo bskal bzang): gi/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag dag byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs bsnyengs med chu srung ba'i tshe// nyin zhag padun du byams pa bsgoms pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
356a5(mdo bskal bzang): gzigs gnas la// dadrang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchid rten la// khang brtsegs mor dar dag ni bkab pa phul// dang
356a6(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ bder gshegs 'od gnas mtshungs pa dge slong tshe// dam chos yongs su bzung phyir spro bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od zer la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems
356a7(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed de// bder gshegs nor zhabs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dgyes de la// me tig ud pa la chag pa gang phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs thA/ 
356a8(mdo bskal bzang): ba grong dpon bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan de la ni// bsod snyoms dang po dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ngos bzangs bya/ 
356b1(mdo bskal bzang): rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od de la// zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs blo bzangs phyug po'i bu tshe sangs rgyas kyi// dge slong kha don 'don la
356b2(mdo bskal bzang): bza' ba byin nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog ma de la ni// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bdir gshegs kun gzi rab byung zhag bdun dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ngad ldan bcom
356b3(mdo bskal bzang): ldan gyis// legs par gsungs la rje su yid rang phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs ye shes mchog ni dge slong tshe// ting 'dzin 'di la yid rang byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs/ 
356b4(mdo bskal bzang): pa yon tan mthu rtsal la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs gnas rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros khyad par la// yan lag lnga ldan sil snyan dag gis mchod// dang po byang chub
356b5(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal de la// lhung zed 'o mas bkang ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzang
356b6(mdo bskal bzang): smin pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sgron de la// a ru ra'i 'bras bu rga phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs stobs byin tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/ 
356b7(mdo bskal bzang): rgyug lag khang dag bskyang nul byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs seng ge'i stabs ni rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzims pa tha ma de la ni// byi ru slar ba bkang ste gtor
356b8(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal rigs gzhon nu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig la dgyes pa de la ni// rin po che'i 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po/ 
357a1(mdo bskal bzang): nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes de la// pad+ma'i rdzing bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
357a2(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog byin pa gnas gtan tshe/ bder gshegs yon tan dpal gyi snying po yi// 'chag sar 'jim pa'i gong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
357a3(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan snying po drang srong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa gsal de la// rgyang ma nas ni thal byar phyag byas nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rin chen grags po shing rtog tshe// de bzhin
357a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa mdangs stobs de la ni// a ti mug ta'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdor gshegs grags pa rmad byung rdza mkhan gyi// bu tshe bder gshegs rnam dag spyan de la// 
357a5(mdo bskal bzang): chu'i sbyin pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mi tshugs mdangs rigs khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtul zhugs la// ba ru ra'i 'bras bu gcig phul
357a6(mdo bskal bzang): nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bskyengs med rgyal chen gnam thos bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs dag brtan pa de la ni// lha rdzas dag gi tsan dan dag gis gtor nas kyang / 
357a7(mdo bskal bzang): dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyal po yi// bdun 'don byed tshe bder gshegs dpag spyan de// zhag bdun par du gdugs tshod gsol nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sas
357a8(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs tshangs par gshegs pa mnyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar par gyis de la// chu bo 'gram dang bston cing mtshon nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs/ 
357b1(mdo bskal bzang): lha'i mthu tshal tshod dpon tshe// phyogs bani dge 'dun sgo gang phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen de la ni// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes dges pa rngo maldan tsha
357b2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor mchog de la// lI'i nal zas dag ni gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha bden mo 'tsheng che// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa'i 'od de ni// bstan
357b3(mdo bskal bzang): gyi gso sman dag la rtag tu spyan grangs nas// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs nor bu'i snying po nyi tshe// khye'u bde gshegs sa ri'i las de la// me tog bzhi zhig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang
357b4(mdo bskal bzang): bo byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yon tan grags pa dga' spyod mo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la// zhugs ling dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
357b5(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs ye shes dro ba la ni bcu pa mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzang glags de la/ lhung bzed bca' ba dag gis bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
357b6(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs bcings med brten bcas gcig pu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sdang ba mchog de ni/ gdugs cheng gsol che srung ma bkres nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs/ 
357b7(mdo bskal bzang): rtul zhugs brtan pa blon che'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas par gzigs de la// khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs lha'i gzi brjid dam chos nub
357b8(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i tshe// dge slong chos smra chos cig ces brjod nas// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lta bur gsungs de la// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs tshangs par thub pa rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshin
358a1(mdo bskal bzang): bzla ba'i dbyangs de la// grong khyer dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs dal bcud dge slong brgyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dpal de la// 
358a2(mdo bskal bzang): so ba'i raka'i btung ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rdul zhugs dka' thub phyag dar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba mkhyen pa po de yi// lam srang khru bcu srid du phyag dar bya
358a3(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer phung po khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po che// 'jigs pa med pas non par spyan grangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems
358a4(mdo bskal bzang): do// bde gshegs gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rams nad med pa'i// blo mnga' de la rgyan drag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tsam pa ka ni rgyal phran che// 
358a5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa du la de la/ a sI kha dag 'bul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi lha de la// 
358a6(mdo bskal bzang): ril ba spyi blugs dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tshigs can bzang po lhu'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdud rtsi de// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tshe legs
358a7(mdo bskal bzang): ba phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// bder gshegs dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mchod stong srung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa grong khyer du// gshegs pa'i tshe na mchod sdong dag ni phul/ 
358a8(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas chen sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i phung po la// sman gyi reng bu dag ni phul nis kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
358b1(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs sna ma'i me tog 'od ni gar mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni// sna ma'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sems can 'od ni chang 'tshod// 
358b2(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra de la ni// phye mas bsgos pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzad shing lha'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i nyi
358b3(mdo bskal bzang): mal/ me tog kar ni ka dag gtor nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mdangs 'gro shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnyengs thob de la/ bzhugs khri dag ni dbus
358b4(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs don legs des ni rdza mkhan me/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa dgyes de la/ zhag cig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni phul nas
358b5(mdo bskal bzang): klung / dang dri byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs khyung mchog blon tshe'i bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul de la/ seng ge'i bdan khri drug ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang nu
358b6(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyod do// / bam po nyi shu lA / bder gshegs lags bzangs thams cad byed pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
358b7(mdo bskal bzang): ni de la ni/ gos gyi dum bu dag ni dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems pa skyed // bder gshegs 'od zer chen po lag bla'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchog de la// skyu rur dang dbul ba byas nas kyang / 
358b8(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems pa skyed// bder gshegs pasams byin ni khrus pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mchog di la/ phyag dang bkru ba'i chab ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
359a1(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs bsod nams 'od ni dbul po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs de la/ bsgo dron bcud dang bcas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skye// bder gshegs rin chen
359a2(mdo bskal bzang): dbyings ni ri mo mkhan gyi mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan dag ni bris nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od ldan de la ni/ dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bde ra gshegs rdo rje sde ni bcings pa med
359a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa po/ ral pa can gyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/ mthu rtsal drag shul can la rdo leb phul nas kyang / dang po'i nga byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan 'phreng rgyud tshe/ de bzhin gabye ba
359a4(mdo bskal bzang): chos kyi gzi brjed la/ tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bder gshegs seng ge'i stabs ni phyag ngar ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ni gzigs papo// ba
359a5(mdo bskal bzang): ldan 'das de phrag la blangs te 'dab rdzab bsgral/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs dri med spyan ni 'dri mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa khrel yod bzang po la/ ka la man dag dbul ba byas na/ 
359a6(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs 'od srungs sbyang nas dge slong tshe/ bder gshegs rgyal chen gzugs kyi chags dag/ lhung bzed 'bru mar bkang bas chag chag btab/ dang
359a7(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder ga kyi blo gros gsal ba rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i spyan de la/ 'od zer chen po me dog dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems skye // bder gshegs pa
359a8(mdo bskal bzang): shes 'gros ni rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/ nyams thag tshe na sangs rgyas dag la phyag 'tshal zhes/ tshig tu brjod nas bder gabye tshogs kyi 'od zer la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs gzi brjid drag shul
359b1(mdo bskal bzang): 'khar ba'i // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mchog des/ dngum las byas pa'i ltung bzed bul nas kyangs dang po byang chub tu ni sems pastod// bde gshegs 'ad zer chen po tshong dpor bur gyung na// de ba'i nas skyem
359b2(mdo bskal bzang): par zhag pa dag nyid de/ nyin cig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs ni 'od grong rdal byis pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tog de'i// ras ki bang na dag gting
359b3(mdo bskal bzang): babyas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bstod/ bder gshegs dri med 'od ni bdun 'ang mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs de la/ chos sbyin dag gi rab phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ 
359b4(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs gzi rjed rnam 'byes chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med pashes gnyen la/ kha ru'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado/ bder gshegs khengs med
359b5(mdo bskal bzang): rtsis pa'i khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdus pa'i blo mnga' ba/ ci tshe'i phub ma phra sna gang phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sbrang rtsi'i zhal ni lham mkhan tshe/ de bzhin ga
359b6(mdo bskal bzang): bdag thul de la ni/ me tog ud pal dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs zla 'o rten bcas nang pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/ mon sran gre'u rul pa
359b7(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni phul nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa glog byin rgyal po'i tshe/ yid 'thang khang pa brtsegs pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rab zhir/ 
359b8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa shing tsheng che/ de bzhin gshegs patse cig 'od de la/ chu dron snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado/ bder gshegs mi 'khrugs pa yis dge slong dag la ni/ ji srid 'tsho ba gan/ 
360a1(mdo bskal bzang): sems med pa 'dzin bcug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu'i mthu rtsal la/ dang po'id byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs dgra bcom grags pardza mkhan mo// de bzhin gshegs pa ste ng+ge'i na
360a2(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ spos kyi za ma tog dag phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs chos kyi yon tan phya mkhan tshe/ de bzhin pa tshul khrims rgyas de la/ khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu
360a3(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs zhing bzang lha'i rtul zhugs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsal de la/ gu gul bdug pa dag gis bdugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni/ sems bskyed// bder ga bye bkod
360a4(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i rgyal po 'khor sbyar tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od de la/ bye dUr+ya'i khang bzang phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs mngon 'phags lngal dang pa'i tshe/ de bzhin ga bye ba meng+ge'i
360a5(mdo bskal bzang): rnam bgyings la/ me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro de dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i blo gros rnyog med pa/ bkad sa dag ni dbul ba/ 
360a6(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bder gshegs pad+ma dpal phyug po'i bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa gsal ba bo// bder gshegs pra pad ma'i me tog gtor dang po byang chub tu na
360a7(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed/ bder gshegs rin chen bkod pa khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs po nges pa'i blo de la/ khron pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs shin du
360a8(mdo bskal bzang): bzang po lam ston bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug spangs pa de la ni/ ljon pa'i lcug ma nyi shu snyed dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder ga sh+ye rin chen mchog ni shing mkhan tshe/ 
360b1(mdo bskal bzang): bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po che/ gtsug lag khang gi sgo dag byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gabye thugs ni shin tu gzhungs pa phyag rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gaskye ba bsdu
360b2(mdo bskal bzang): ba'i blo na minga' ba de/ lam srang dag tu gshegs te gos dag bting nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rgya mtsho byin ni 'dun 'don tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal ldan shing rta le// me tog dag
360b3(mdo bskal bzang): gi gzhal med khang pa phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshang tog zhing pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i mthu rtsal la// mo ni sran gre bu spar gang gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sos
360b4(mdo bskal bzang): bskye// bder gshegs zla gdugs ni ra yu ha ka'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/ byug pa dag ni dbul ba nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro spos 'tshong che/ 
360b5(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs phyogs rnams gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi/ gtsug lag khang dag spros kyis gdugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rgyal po ni/ ri mo mkhan tshe bder
360b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs ston gsal de'i// sgo gang dag ni ri mo bris nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs ye shes grags pa gos 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtogs bzod la// chos gos srang
360b7(mdo bskal bzang): brgyang dag ni phul nas kyang / rang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyod/ bder gshegs kun rgyal tshong dpon bur gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs de la/ rin cenas mod dag phus nas kyang / dang pa byang chungab duni
360b8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskye'o// bder gshegs yon tan 'od ni mthing mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyis mi thub la/ 'thing por gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra na
361a1(mdo bskal bzang): gos 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i me tog la/ sku rags dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rgyal la phyag rdzi dpon po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs lha'i pad ma la/ chur
361a2(mdo bskal bzang): bdag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs pad ma'i 'od zer bram ze'i/ rgyal rtse'i bu che bder gshegs kun gzigs la/ ha~M tib par dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
361a3(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed/ bder gshegs rtul zhugs bzang po snod spyad mkhan gi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni/ 'bras dras snyim pa gang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
361a4(mdo bskal bzang): sgron rgyal bcas pa mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i tshogs can la/ snum mkhur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs glog gi tog ni ded dpon mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
361a5(mdo bskal bzang): don gyi dgongs pa la/ na bza' cha phrugs gcig cig phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs 'od zer rgyal po rdza mkhan che/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la/ khrus rkyen bum pa dag ni phul
361a6(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs skar mkhan tshal gyi las byed tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i zhal de la/ lo ma'i gting ba dag ni 'ul nas kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems myong / 
361a7(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs grags rdzogs nur bu'i tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sman par dgongs de la/ rin po che'i bla re phul nas kyang / dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pa skyeng stobs kyi 'khor
361a8(mdo bskal bzang): mochos sgyur ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa'i rgyal mtshan de la ni/ dri gsung ldan pa'i skyed mos tshal phul nas/ dang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rgyal ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// 
361b1(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag de la ni/ rin chen gdugs ni stong snyed phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs spyan mdzes grong dpon bu ma'i cha/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i mthu rtsal la/ me mang
361b2(mdo bskal bzang): ngag gi bla re phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ bder gshegs rnyog pa med don shing srang tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi rtsod de la/ tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang ba

361b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa bsod nams mu stegs la/ rtsa gur dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs thogs med blo ni 'gar ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'od de la/ mtshon
361b6(mdo bskal bzang): cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs sgra gcan lnga ni lcags 'gar gi/ khye'u'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// ye shes go cha la ni khab phul nas/

361b8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs kha lo sgyur ba dbul po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la/ mchil lam rim gcig pa dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skye dbang mtshungs ni grong

363b8(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan mchog ni zhing pi'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla de la/ bal sran sngon po slar gang gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskrad do// bder gshegs 'brug sgra'i dbyangs ni rtsis pa'i/ khye'u tshe na
364a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen la/ 'phreng ba'i chun po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mngon shes tog ni rigs rtse'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/ ngar

364b1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa smon la mtha' yas la/ lcags las byas pa'i snong dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon me/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od ces
364b2(mdo bskal bzang): sras kyi lnga dgu dag gis gdugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni phyin pa yis/ de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar bzod de la/ dpyid ka cha bron gong bu phul nas kyang / dang po
364b3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ge dag ni 'gar ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la/ de la khab dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyedado// bder gshegs 'od
364b4(mdo bskal bzang): zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo ba'i bdag nyid de la ni/ sha na dag las byas pa'i na bza' phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdor gshegs ye shes dpa' bo grong rdal gyi

364b7(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs mthu ldan stabs ni ral pA tsi na/ sbyin bsreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// zhu med dbyangs la zhugs ling phu nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// badrer gshegs
364b8(mdo bskal bzang): bsod nas phung po tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin go shigs pa kun du gzigs drol/ lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang ni dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs gzugs mchog grong khyer srung hrIH
365a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang po la/ btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan spos 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzun la
365a2(mdo bskal bzang): sras kyi rgyu dag phul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron ma slongs mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rna 'byor sems pa la/ 'gron bu nyi shu dag ni gtor nas kyang / dang po byang
365a3(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdir gshegs bzi brjid phung po rtsa thun mo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mor gnas de la/ rtsa las byas pa'i gdugs ngag phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
365a4(mdo bskal bzang): chub rgyal po shing rta'i/ mkhan tsha de bzhin gshegs pa dpal lo la/ shing rta dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs mi zad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdul bka' la/ bzhun
365a5(mdo bskal bzang): khri'u dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs mngon rtogs spyan ni sman pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/ lhag sman dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tus
365a6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bder gshegs yan lag rgyas pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron de la/ lhung bzed dar bas bkang ste phul nas kyang / dag po byang chub du ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yul 'khor shes rab mar 'tshe
365a7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la/ zhun mar srang brgyad dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ni bong rdzi'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs de la/ bzhugs
365a8(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i rdo gdan dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs gzi brjid tshim byed rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mu stegs la/ se'u'i 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po
365b1(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu sems bskyed// bder gshegs shes rab byin ni mar 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la/ mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzi dbyang
365b2(mdo bskal bzang): rdza mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog de la/ ril ba chu'i sa bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bzhin gshegs pa 'gon po rigs bu'i tshe/ bder gshegs bzang po ngo mtshar mkhyen pa la
365b3(mdo bskal bzang): 'chag sa dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub ta ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chags med mdzod ni mi bkren tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar bzod de la/ tshod ma'i gong bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub
365b4(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rtse bos byin ni lha'i bu/ dbang phyug chen de de bzhin gshegs pa po// seng ge'i nga ro de la bstod nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa tso bo spos 'tshong tshe/ 
365b5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la/ spos lo'i ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes mthu rtsal shing srung tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gsal de la/ ko phyi
365b6(mdo bskal bzang): me tog phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro dge slong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi snod de la/ bu raM chu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 
365b7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal de la/ skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shugs 'chang tshong/ 
365b8(mdo bskal bzang): dben bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gnas pa po// de la gdugs ngag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe
366a1(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs pa kun gyi blo de 'khor bcas ther 'bum dag/ dbyar gnas chen phongs pa med pas spyan drangs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzangs tshong pa'i tshe de sa
366a2(mdo bskal bzang): sbrang rtsi bzhed pa dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs grags byin 'dzom gling rgyal po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de'i/ gtsug lag khang ni bye ba byas nas kyang / dang
366a3(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzangs spos 'tsheng tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtul shugs brtan de la/ spos kyi srang gi gzhi cha phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do
366a4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa gser rtog tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'tshod de la/ khron pa zlum po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
366a5(mdo bskal bzang): thal bar grog de la/ mchod sbyin chen po dag ni byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ge'i sde ni dbang blon gyi/ bu che de bzhin gshegs pa grags mchog la/ skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba
366a6(mdo bskal bzang): byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ner lho'i bu ni tshong dpon bu mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thang rdzogs pa po// de la bkru ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu
366a7(mdo bskal bzang): nonisems bskyed do// bder gshegs grags pa rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe/ de bzhini gshegs pa blo brtan de la ni/ rang gi rgyan rnams ngag gris gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
366a8(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal ba rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer can de la/ thod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rgya chen snying po tsha ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gsheg
366b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa dbyangs chen de la ni/ mu tig dag las pa'i gdugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bsod nams 'od zer lcags bsrungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs gsal de la ni/ sog
366b2(mdo bskal bzang): ma dag las byas pa'i 'phreng phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sgra 'dod 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni/ lhung bzed 'bru mar dag ni bkang phul nas
366b3(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sbyin rgyal rtsis po'i bur gyur che/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la/ me tog 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
366b4(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs ye shes rtsegs ni ljongs dag gi/ pho nya tshan de bzhin gshegs pa po// bdud rtsi gsal la sbrang rtsi'i dbul ba phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog shing bsrungs che/ 
366b5(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub mthu rtsal la/ ma tu lung ka dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sa bdag khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgra mchog sems pa la/ khar
366b6(mdo bskal bzang): brtsegs pa gos kyis g.yogs pa dag phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs grol brnyes btso blag mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros drag shul la/ ras yug khra bo dag ni phul nas
366b7(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dag po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs phyug lag khang gser 'tsheng khye'u'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i mthu rtsal la/ gser gyi bu pa dag ni phul kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
366b8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs sgra chen bzang po spong ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtul shugs chen po la/ rtsa'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 'der gshegs thub doga'i 'og ri ka'i tshe/ ngo bzhin gsheg
367a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa nor bu 'bar ba'i/ gshegs pa dag ni byas te phul nas kyapa dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal drung 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med blo la/ dung dag su
367a2(mdo bskal bzang): ba bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs zla ba'i 'od zer tshong ngus pa'i/ khye'u tshe na bder gshegs seng ge'i dbyangs de la/ khab bor mar khus bkang ste phul nas kyang / drang po
367a3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gsere 'od tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rgas de la/ mu tig tshun 'phreng dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
367a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs lha'i yon tan dbang po blon che'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas de la/ dpag tshad gcig pa'i skyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa
367a5(mdo bskal bzang): chos gdugs bram ze'i tshe/ ri'i rtse mo nas ni bdag 'chongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ru gshegs bsod nams lag ni tsho blo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs
367a6(mdo bskal bzang): ba bdud rtsi sgron ma de la ni/ me tog me ngan tshang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chags med spos 'tshong khye'u'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub skabs da la/ sran
367a7(mdo bskal bzang): gre'u phul gsuM zhig ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes rgya nom rgyal po'i// pho nya chen bde gshegs byal ba'i/ bde gshegs pashes gnyen de la lan cig bsgor/ 
367a8(mdo bskal bzang): nas ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs blo ni nga rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gzigs de la/ bum pa chu'i bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ 
367b1(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs gzi brjid tha~Mng dang dpon tshe/ dge 'dun dang por zhal zas gsol nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman lag bla'i tshen
367b2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa'i mchog de la/ skyu ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs ni grol tog ni bder bcas te/ 'di rdzab dag tu za ba btsugs nas kyang / de
367b3(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad zhing pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong 'bar de la ni/ me tog dmar po dag ni phul nis kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sas
367b4(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes rgyal po 'bras sa lu/ khur ba'i tsha na bder gshegs kun 'ad la/ me tog kar ni ka dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs 'dzud
367b5(mdo bskal bzang): dpa' bo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/ rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs chu bo slong ni glong brdal byis pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng
367b6(mdo bskal bzang): ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i/ skabs la me tog ud pal drag gis gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs thogs med grags pa spong ba'atshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag dag 'de la ni/ 
367b7(mdo bskal bzang): mo tsan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i phung po 'tshong tshe/ dri bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang mtshungs dri la/ rdza rnga dang ni lo ma phul nas kyang / dang po byeng chung tu ni/ 
367b8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskye// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyang snyan rtsa 'tshong che/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ne/ rtsa skyil dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ri dbang mtshungs mi// 
368a1(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs/ de la gdugs dag dbul bu byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rtsegs lha'i bsnyen bkur 'byed che bdes rgya
368a2(mdo bskal bzang): bsod nams brtsegs pa la/ me tog tshangs pa gang ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs thar pa'i gzi byin rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zla ba la/ tsug kra ru ka'i 'bras bu rgyang
368a3(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs legs mdzad gar mkhan bu mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sran sdug de la ni/ ras bal dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs
368a4(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs rab zhi skal ni 'phreng rgyud tshe/ de bzhin gshegs bsnyan par grags de la/ tsaM pa ka'i 'bras bu phul nos kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yid 'o gsung ni ngam/ 
368a5(mdo bskal bzang): mi'o tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsol ba'i dpal de la/ ras yug dgra ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// de bzhin gau shegs paM blo dbyangs smon pa'i tshe/ bde bshegs gang ge'i mche ba rmongs
368a6(mdo bskal bzang): mal du/ 'bru mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha gdugs mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog 'os la/ du su bsil yab dag ni bu/ 
368a7(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ge'i logs ni ded dpon che/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ni ma 'od de la/ ston mo chen mo dgra ni byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
368a8(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs chos kyi mthu rtsal rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra zhir gyur pa la/ dngul las byas pa'i bang na ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skal pa bzang po dang / 
368b1(mdo bskal bzang): me de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i mthu la/ gser las byas pa'i bla re phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mi 'khrugs mdog ni rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo de la
368b2(mdo bskal bzang): 'brung ga dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs gzi brjid rgyal gling dpon no// grong khyer dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang / de banan gshegs pa ga'i brjing go dgos la/ dang po byang chub tu
368b3(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mdzad lag bla'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtogs pa la/ ka ra ba ri'i me tog phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// der gsheg spyan legs phyag rdzi'i dpon po che/ de bani
368b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa zla mchog de la/ lhung zed mor nas bkang phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs don gnas blo ni nad pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i stobs de la/ nyin mo zhugs pa'i gnas khang
368b5(mdo bskal bzang): phyags nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs don gnas 'od zer lha dbangs che/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i rtse de la/ mar me'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de
368b6(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa sres gzi rgyal po'i sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa bgyes pa la/ ud pa la sngon po cig ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// bde gshegs kun dga' mdzad ni rnga mkhan tshe/ de bzhin
368b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa ud pal dri de la/ sna phyi sa dag byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bshags don yod zhags pa lag bla'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug la/ lo'i skyil bu byas te phul
368b8(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// der zhen gshegs khro btso tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tsa pa'i mchog de la/ rdzing bu dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do/ 
369a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs bzugs mchog thakha ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtul shugs ltos pa la/ dbyar gnas pa deg ning bul 'byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs legs gshegs
369a2(mdo bskal bzang): rol mo mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shim pa'i dpral de la/ rol mo'i rnga chen brdungs te phul nas ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rab sbyin glegs pa la gus byed pa'i tshe/ de bzhin ga h+ye
369a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa gzi brjid chen po de la ni/ bdag pa'i tshal dag sbyar te byas te dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tsho gsung de la
369a4(mdo bskal bzang): bu yug langs te 'jams kyis btung ba phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde ge shegs lha 'i phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di las rgal ba la/ zhun mar ci dgos pa dag dgu
369a5(mdo bskal bzang): ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shes rab byin ni phug mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas spyan de la/ phug dag byas te dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems
369a6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyod// bder gshegs mnya ba zhag bdag nyid khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo 'bar de la ni/ til 'bru sbar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzi me dngos 'brum
369a7(mdo bskal bzang): spos can mkhan gyin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma byos pa di sa das / spyana'i me tog slong ba'i sgyumyu nga brgyang bus/ dang byang chub tu ni sems pa sgyid // de brazhin gshegs pa rgya ma rigs la srin ma / 
369a8(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa sna tshogs dpungs de la/ yi srang dag ni mtshon pabyas nas kyang dang bo byang chu du sems paspyong / bde gshegs sa ldan shing ni bu ma chang mkhan mo/ bzhin gshegs pa yon tanang migs pa byin dem
369b1(mdo bskal bzang): rurura'i bcung khu dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog cha 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs brtsang mar gnas de dag/ zla ba gsu du tshal spyan drangs nas/ dang po byang chub tu
369b2(mdo bskal bzang): nisems bskye// bder gshegs par grol bgrol gtsug shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim spos de la/ chu 'brum bcud khru dag ni phul nus kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni lams bskyed// bder gshegs chos lnga
369b3(mdo bskal bzang): yur ba mkhan gyi tshe// yur ba dag ni bskor te byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od dri la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs spos gnas tshong dpon chung ma'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i phung po la
369b4(mdo bskal bzang): dbyar gnas ngag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa grogs pangs sman pa'i tshe/ 'bru mar btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bden gsheg
369b5(mdo bskal bzang): ye shes mdzod ni thags mkhan che/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de'o// ras kyi kha tshar drag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bang ra gshegs gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
369b6(mdo bskal bzang): mchod par 'os de la/ me tog 'bar sha'i chun 'phreng phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dani tsheng dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang rtsegs pa la/ kha so dag las byas pa'i bdan
369b7(mdo bskal bzang): khwa phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs mya ngan med po'i gser mkhan mo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/ dngul lus byas pa'i me tog tor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ 
369b8(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer ni/ a ba ka rar gyur tsho de bzhin gshegs/ sna ma'i mdzod la a kar phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskye // bder gshegs yul 'khor tog ni tshong pa'i tshe/ bangar
370a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs sna tshogs dbyangs kyis brgyan da la kha so'i khang partsegs pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// ba der gsheg pad+ma'i snying po sdud dge slong tshe/ 'jim pa dag las byas
370a2(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas chang tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa gsal de la/ kru ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs / 
370a3(mdo bskal bzang): de/ der gshegs lha'i 'od zer dge slong tshe/ bco lnga'i tshe na chos kyi sbyin byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan spong ba la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shes rab me tog spos 'tsho/ 
370a4(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes 'od la/ smug gi nor bu dog ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bras 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs gi skabs de la/ 
370a5(mdo bskal bzang): 'bras kyis slar bkang ste gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byor ldan ni/ shing rta mkhan tshe bder gshegs gsal ba'i dpal/ de'i klung gi stobs dag bya
370a6(mdo bskal bzang): nas kya pha dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gi shegs pa tshangs dbyig shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar grags de la/ nag go dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
370a7(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do kha der gshegs phyag na rin che ni rgyal po yis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol 'od zer de'i ni/ na bza' dag ni kha dog bsgyur nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// ba der gshegs dbang
370a8(mdo bskal bzang): ldan tshal gyi las byed tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam gnon la/ kha ri'i 'bras bu brgyad phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rdzogs par gsung ba shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin
370b1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po la/ sta gan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gsung shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi me tog la gong
370b2(mdo bskal bzang): na'i me tog gter phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os rgyal bu'i tshen rdzing bu dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal de la/ dang po byang chub tu
370b3(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nyi ma blon po chen po'i tshe/ bder gshegs rnam par smin pa chen po'i tshe/ rdo las byas pa'i khang pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs pa 'di
370b4(mdo bskal bzang): rgyal skud pa 'tshong ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la/ skud pa srong cig dbul ba byas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes brnyas pa chang 'tshang tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
370b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs par dgyes de la/ bcud khu'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa grong dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtso rnam gnon la/ grong gi mchog
370b6(mdo bskal bzang): ma bcu gcig phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs rma bya 'bru mar mkhon gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs po nyi ma'i phung po la/ me tog 'bar shis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar phul/ dang po byang chub tu
370b7(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ches sbyin rgyal po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pazla ba'i dbyangs de la/ sil snyan brgya yis mchod pa byas nas kyang dadang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa
370b8(mdo bskal bzang): phan byed 'gor ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs po lha'i tog de la/ ral gri dag gi dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed// bder gshegs yo shes ldan pa dung 'bung tshe/ dung sgra dag ni bud ba rgya/ 
371a1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'od de la/ dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan ka'i nyi ma la/ nor bu bye dU r+ya dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bder gshes
371a2(mdo bskal bzang): 'od zer dra ma lo ma'i khur khyer tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug de la/ ha min 'dza ti me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs bye dUr+ya'i snying po shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin
371a3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa brtan pa'i blo de la/ oM 'bra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shing srungs tshe/ de ban ni gshegs pa ljon pa me tog la/ ka'i ma
371a4(mdo bskal bzang): tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sna'i rgyal po ded dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dbyangs de la/ skyed mos tshal dgra bcu snyed phul nas kyang
