371a6(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gshegs pa drang srong lcags 'gar tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra de la/ sngar klags pa'i spyad dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dog 'od dge
371a7(mdo bskal bzang): slong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i lha nga la/ nor bu'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od/ tshong pa'i tshe na bder gshegs
371a8(mdo bskal bzang): dbyangs mchog la/ shing na ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal/ phyag dar ba tsha na bder gshegs dpal dgyes la/ btsug lag khang dang 'breng ba phul/ 
371b1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed// bder gshegs skyes bu'i zla ba bri ze'i tshe/ cong rong dag tu zab pa byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i grags pa la/ dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra
371b2(mdo bskal bzang): gcan bri ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi me tog gi/ bdan bdag yud ci bting ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bdud rtsi'i 'od ni gzhan bran tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen
371b3(mdo bskal bzang): po de/ nyin bzhugs pa'i gan su bdan bting nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mchog ma tshong dpon gyi/ bu tshe bder gshegs 'jig rten bla ma la/ d+ha nu ka ra'i me tog gtor
371b4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od ded dpon tshe/ bder gshegs blo mchog la du zhugs pa na/ mtshan mo rtsa sgren dag ni phul nas kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye
371b5(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs bzhi pa'i skabs ni rgyal ba'i tshe/ khang bzangs 'dzeg tshe bder gshegs ldan 'od la/ me tog dag gi chun po phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes rgya 'tsho mi bkren
371b6(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od gzi la/ skyu ru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 'der gshegs ring dbang 'phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bya chu gzi brjid la/ mu
371b7(mdo bskal bzang): tog 'phreng ba khru gang phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rab zhi sman pa'i khye'u'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgongs pa sbyangs pa la/ sbyin pa'i gso sman dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu nis/ 
371b8(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bder gshig yon tan mtha' stobastan rdzi'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa to gi 'od de la/ tsan tsad+ha ka dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub ta sems bskyed// bder ga sh+ya lha dbang rtsis pa khye'u'i tshe/ de bzhin ga sh+ya ba dgra 'dul de la ni/ ma
373a1(mdo bskal bzang): tog ma ngan 'amang gi chun po rdul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan sdes 'tsheng tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi me tog gi/ bcugs khang spos kyis phyug byas phyugs ma
373a2(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 'dir gshegs nges pa'angs rtsal chen bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la/ 'dun khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub du sems bskyed do// de bozhin sa
373a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa don gnas mi bkren tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs de la/ snod dag chu'i bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan gzi brjid dpal ni khyim bdag tshe/ dge 'dun
373a4(mdo bskal bzang): dag la rnyed pa snum bag phul nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub pad+ma de la ni/ dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zla mkhyen ldan rtsis pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i sa mchod de la/ gur gu byug pa/ 
373a5(mdo bskal bzang): lag pas phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nga ro dpag med phyug rdzi'i tshe/ bde bzhin gshegs pa 'das las rgal ba la/ ha ri ni ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
373a6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzings smos 'tshong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa gsal ba la/ kun tu ra'i byug pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shin tu thugs bzhugs
373a7(mdo bskal bzang): mi bkren mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog la/ thal me sbyar ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug bral/ 'khor los sgyur tshe bde ras
373a8(mdo bskal bzang): dpal chen la/ grong khyer dpag tshad bcu pa phul nas kyang / dang de byeng chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad par 'phags / shing srungs chen bder gshegs 'ong bzhin ladapa gu'i 'bras// 
373b1(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs mchog tu mdzes gshegs rtsis pa'i tshe/ bran me tshen bder gshegs ma 'od la/ me tog kar ni ka ras tor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ bden
373b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs zhi dron rgyal po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug da la/ lan grangs brgya rnyed bskor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye// de bzhin gshegs pa skyon med gtan bcas tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba dbye
373b3(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ men sran gle'u'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedo// bder gshegs blo dbyangs dge ba shing 'tshang che/ sgo gang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbyangs de la/ dang po bya/ 
373b4(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu sems bsnyad do// ba der gshegs pad+ma'i 'od ni dge slong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin pa la/ skra'i khras dang dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsnyad do// bder gshegs 'od zer bzang po dngul
373b5(mdo bskal bzang): po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i mthu rtsal la/ bsod snyoms dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs skyes pa'i mdog ni shing srungs che/ de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med pa de
373b6(mdo bskal bzang): la/ shu ti'i me tog dag ni phul nus kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// de bzhin gshegs pa stegs bzangs sgo ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs mdangs 'od grong khyer gshegs pa na/ thal mo sbyar te phyag dag btsal nas kya
373b7(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs tshogs dbang ched dpon bur gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying po la/ rna brgyan 'phreng ba dag ni phul ba'i tshe/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // de bzhin gshegs
373b8(mdo bskal bzang): bsnyengs bral bri ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od de la/ me tog ta ra na yis gtor nas kang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs ye shes bzhed pa dbul po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/ 2
374a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa med pas spyan ni drangs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs stobs can bka' thub can gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'od de la/ lo ma'i skyil po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byung /

374a4(mdo bskal bzang): chen me shel phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bsnyengs med mdun 'od bur gyur tshe/ bder gshegs 'khrul pa med pa'i blo ldan la/ sin tu pa ra'i me tog phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni
374a5(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bder gshegs gzigs pa chen po rtsa thun tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtul shugs 'byor de la/ a ka ru'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs sman

375b1(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskya // bder gshegs drang srong dpon po bseng ste tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mdzes pa la// khab ral ngag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sos bskye'o// bde rag bye

375b5(mdo bskal bzang): tu gzigs pa danur mkhan/ byed che de bzhin gshegs pa lngas mchod la/ bag chos drag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa / de bzhin
375b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa rdul bral 'dren mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la/ spyi gri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs yon tan tshogs ni khrus pa'i tshe/ kha des/ 
375b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs 'khrul pa med cing sbyor ba la// khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mi tog ldan pa khyim bdag tshe// dri bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po yod no// 
375b8(mdo bskal bzang): dang bcas 'bye ba dag/ g.yar gnas zla gsum nal bas ribargyabs gsol nas/ dang po byang nub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yul 'khir spobs pa bul po'i ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ying 'idi dbyangs de la ma
376a1(mdo bskal bzang): snying po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde gshegs rin chen rab sbyin byi ba byed pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par spyod pa mnos nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dbyangs can
376a2(mdo bskal bzang): de la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs zla ba dgos pa rgyal bu'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa smon la sbyangs pa la/ sgye'u gsher me tog drag gis gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskye'o// bder ga bye
376a3(mdo bskal bzang): khengs mang bcab mayin gyi tshe/ de bzhini gshegs pa lha 'dod de la ni/ mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // bder gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni bla za'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab
376a4(mdo bskal bzang): stobs de la/ a 'bra'i 'bras bu drag ni phul nus kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyeda'o// bder gshegs dbang sgyur rgyal po khyi dag gi/ bu che der gshegs kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la/ sred kres le ma drag ni
376a5(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs bdud rtsi gsal ba chos mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la/ gser snam dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sos bskyed/ 
376a6(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs bsam gtan snyoms pa shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thub pa'i me tog la/ me tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs khrug med tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/ 
376a7(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i blo de la/ nor bu rin chen glegs pa phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs dri ma rab zhi phyug po'i bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rlabs 'joms la/ gdu bu dag ni
376a8(mdo bskal bzang): dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs phyogs ma sbeng pa khyim bdag gyi/ bu tshe bder gshegs shes rab rdzogs pa la/ mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sas/ 
376b1(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// der gshegs mdzes pabu'am shing sbyangs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa cher ma dkrugs pa la/ bu ram shing dag phul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal bzangs tshong ba'i tshe// 
376b2(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dul de la ni/ mu tig dmar po dag gis gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shugs gnas ye shes rdza mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco rgyas pa la/ 
376b3(mdo bskal bzang): buM pa chu'i bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs gsung dbang bca' ba mkhan gi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims mchog gnas la/ bca ba dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang / 
376b4(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzi brjid smin pa chen po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mnyam dgongs pa la/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do bder
376b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs blo gros zab mo khyim bdag tsha/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgongs pa bsnyengs med la/ mu tig 'bras bu gsum ngag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs bdud rtsi gzhan gyi kho la
376b6(mdo bskal bzang): po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus gsal ba de la ni/ 'chag sar ljon shing rig byed bskrun nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// der gshegs chos stobs tshal gyi las byed tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
376b7(mdo bskal bzang): brgya chen la/ 'od ma'i tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ldan dgan po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i bri nga la/ rtsa'i bcud khu dag ni phul nas kyang
376b8(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog 'o ni lam ston tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib med rgongs pa'i/ la dag nye bar mtshon pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
377a1(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs lams gsum mchod gnas gser rtog che// de bzhin gshegs pa bsrings med 'od zer la// gser srang gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye// bde ga shes
377a2(mdo bskal bzang): sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po bye 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbyangs can de la ni// kar sha ba ni ri ba'i phyi dag dul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod rtsal chen bu
377a3(mdo bskal bzang): zo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gsungs pa de yi ni// 'khor gyi khyams dag gser gyi snam bu bting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs thar pa'i rgyal mtshan ras bal mkhan// byed
377a4(mdo bskal bzang): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog la// ras bal dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bdud rtsi'i 'od ni gtsang sbra can gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal
377a5(mdo bskal bzang): po de la ni// su ra dA ra sha ni me tog gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po sbas pa la// rgya sran dag gi phye dag phul nas kyang / dang
377a6(mdo bskal bzang): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa phreng rgyud che// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i bsam gtan la// sabatab rna'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
377a7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs snang ldan chen po lam du zhugs pa la// bder gshegs rin chen phung po 'dron po byed pa yis// nam gyi gung thun dag la mel che byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mdzes gshegs
377a8(mdo bskal bzang): rmis pa'i bur gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan spos de la// tsam bka'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chu tu ni sems bskyed// bde gshegs nyi ma lhar gshegs mar 'tshong tsho// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pags/ 
377b1(mdo bskal bzang): del ma bu'i btung bdag ni rdul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs dag pa'i 'od ni dge slong // bder gshegs mngon 'phags de'i 'chags dag cag chag phyag dang byas te stan btid nas/ dang // 
377b2(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyedo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od shugs tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug de la// snang smon dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan gtsug
377b3(mdo bskal bzang): ni tshong po'i me/ de ban ni gshegs pa dpag med blo de la// tsan dan dang ni 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye// bdir gshegs dpal rdzogs btso ba smig mkhan gyi tshe// bder gshegs nyi ma stong ldan
377b4(mdo bskal bzang): gzi brjid la// sos ka'i cha ba'i dus su skyo ma phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs song skabs rgyal po'i bu me'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun po de la ni// chos kyi bdan dag bting ba byas nas kyang / 
377b5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdir gshegs gyen du 'phags pa shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags de la// yungs skar spar bar bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
377b6(mdo bskal bzang): dro/ bder gshegs me tog byin ni shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam grags la// e ran da'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'gyed tsheng pa'i
377b7(mdo bskal bzang): che// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur rgyal po la// mu tig spar ba bkang skye phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs lhung bzed me tog gsor pas bkang ste phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems
377b8(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gshegs le shos rgyal btsong ba'i ma// de banan gshegs pa 'od zer mangs pa la/ bu mgong bu dog ni bul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gzhigs bkod pa mdzes pa zhing / 
378a1(mdo bskal bzang): srungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gsal de la/ se'u gnad dag spel pa bkang ste phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs gti mug med gnas bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gabye ba spyan mchog
378a2(mdo bskal bzang): la ni/ mig mi 'chums pas blta ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye // de bzhin gshegs pa rma med lham mkha tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i rtul zhugs la/ mchil laM dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub
378a3(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tog rgyal mtshan grong brdal gyi khye'u tshen bder gshegs yid 'ong gzigs de la/ me tog par shi'i 'phreng 'a dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// bder gshegs bde bar dgongs pa shing ldan
378a4(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/ ud ngal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs gti mug med rgyal 'khor sgyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dmyangs chen de la ni/ na za rin po che dag phul
378a5(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs cho ga mkhan pa blon pa'i tshe/ 'ob su stegs dag gzugs pa byas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpung gzig rdzing chen po che la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
378a6(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs dag pa'i rgya mtsho tshong dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od de la/ khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rin chen mang ni byis pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs
378a7(mdo bskal bzang): pa dgra bcom mchod gnas la/ mchil lam dag ni dbul ba byas kyang / dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mi dma' ba ni shing srungs tshe/ bder gshegs yon tan phung po gzi brjid la/ rgun chang dag ni phul ba
378a8(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs skye bo dga' mdzad dge slong che/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gsal de la ni/ spos ni srang gi ba ni cha phul nas kyang / dang po bying chub tu ni sems bskyed// der ga bye
378b1(mdo bskal bzang): rtsis pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro chen po la/ skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas kyang / dang chu bo byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// bder gshegs ma num pa ni sngon pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom gsal de la/ skye ma dag ni dbul ba byas
378b2(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs srid sred dri spangs shing srungs tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa legs gnas la/ shing sha pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bden
378b3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs spyod pa'i stegs ni tshor ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa stegs ni dbang po la/ sran chung dag ni 'bras chan gzegs ma phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs lha mang sAn sgrags rim gro ga byed tshe bder
378b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas la/ rdo rje'i gdan khri dag ni dul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rin chen stabs ma nong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rin chen la/ bro yis spar ba skar
378b5(mdo bskal bzang): ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs pad+ma bsnams pa gtso sreg mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po'i na za dag ni bkru bshal byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ 
378b6(mdo bskal bzang): de ba zhin gshegs pa dpal ni khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa'i snyigs de la/ bzhugs bdag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs dgra rgyal bram ze'i chung ma'i tshe/ bdes
378b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs khro bcom byang chub snying por ni/ gshegs tshe sbrang rtsir sres pa'i 'o ma bul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs 'byor ldan grags pa slong ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sku de la/ u duM 'bar ra'i/ 
378b8(mdo bskal bzang): 'bras bu phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yul 'khor bzang po 'phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen grags pa'i 'od de la/ shing 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu dbul ba byas na
379a1(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs me tog 'od ni phyugs rdzi'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro rnam dag la/ lhung bzed de rabs bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sus
379a2(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// bder gshegs seng ge'i nga ro bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po bzhed de la/ bstod pa dag gis dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs zla ltar shwar ba tshor
379a3(mdo bskal bzang): ba'o che/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab ba ni dag po la/ dngul las las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 'drer gshegs 'jom pa'i mchog ni tshong dpon mo// de bzhinag
379a4(mdo bskal bzang): bdul ba'i gzi brjid kyi zug lag 'ang ni can dan dmar pos byugs/ byang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo 'phreng rgyud che/ de bzhin gshegs pa laji brjid legs mchod la/ 
379a5(mdo bskal bzang): me tog bla re dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs phan par gshegs pa tshong ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshong pa'i 'od de la/ dngul las byas pa'i me tog gto
379a6(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs bsod nams sgron ma rgyal po 'khor sgyur che/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dag gi mchod rten de'i/ gdugs mchog lo grangs bdun stong bar du
379a7(mdo bskal bzang): sbyar nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs dbyangs kyis skul ba ded dpon che/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyad pa dag de'i/ gtsug lag khang ni tsan din dmar por byas/ dang po byang chub tu ni
379a8(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed// bder gshegs ko'u ta ma laM ston tshe/ de bzhin gshegs po stobs zangs gzi brjid la/ gdugs tshod dag ni sbyar te gsol nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mdangs stobs/ 
379b1(mdo bskal bzang): drim ze khye'u'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan mchog de la mi ldan grangs dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs blo gnas rang bzhin shing rta mkhan/ byed tshe der gshegs ma
379b2(mdo bskal bzang): rtsal chen po la/ shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// 'dor gshegs zla ba bzung po mi bkren tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzugs de la/ mar me gcig cig ni phul nas kyang / dang
379b3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub yan lag me tog gi/ shing thog 'tshong tshe bder gshegs rab mnga' la/ a 'bra'i 'bras bu gsum ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems spyong/ 
379b4(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs bkra shis spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tag stegs de la/ tsam pa kwa'i me tog phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyeda'o// bder gshegs sems snyen 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
379b5(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ blon po chen bder gshegs lhun po'i 'od de'i/ 'chags dag ni bye dUr+yal byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyeda'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzi brjod stobs/ shing srungs chen bder gshegs shing ba
379b6(mdo bskal bzang): blo gros de la se'u 'bru cig phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs dge ba'i sgron ma tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la kha so gzims khri dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chu/ 
379b7(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyeda'o// der gshegs mthu rtsal brtan po bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcas brtan pa la/ a 'bras khu ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa lha sgra tshong
379b8(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub de la ni/ ba la shi ka dag ni phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rabazhi gos 'tsheng tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa phan po re gI de la/ na bza' drug ni dbul bya byas
380a1(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs nyi ma yin la ni khyim bdag me/ de bu ni na gshegs pa lha'i mchod de la/ rdzing bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder dbye
380a2(mdo bskal bzang): thar pa'i rtul shugs mi bkren tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa spang ba'i shugs de la/ pri yang ku'i bson snyoms dul nas kyang / drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs tshul khrims 'od ni dbul ba'i tshe/ de bzhin rtse
380a3(mdo bskal bzang): pa rin chen gtong de la/ tshong ma'i khu ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs tu la zhugs gnas pa khyim bdag gi bu mo tshe na bder gshegs ye shes shugs/ de la su dpal lnga ldi rdul
380a4(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs rdu la med 'phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bram ze de la ni/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder
380a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs snying po 'phags pa tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa bzang po la/ ras yug gcig cig dgab byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa mig sman laM ston tshe// de bzhin
380a6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa tshogs ni rnam gnon la/ a 'dra'i 'bras bu dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ongal mdzang rgyal po'i che/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid snang ba la/ 
380a7(mdo bskal bzang): gser gdugs yub byedadu rus byas pa/ dul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// 'dor gshegs spos 'od tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i stobs de la/ byugs pa dag ni dbul ba byas
380a8(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs dus mkhyen 'od ni rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal de la/ kham pa dag la byas pa'i lhung bzed dul tha dang po byang chub tu ni sems ba
380b1(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs dran pa'i dbang po cheng pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi pa'i blo de la/ lam du zam pa dag ni gtsugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bsgre'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zang 'phreng rgyud tshe/ de bzhin
380b2(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa sgyu ni sdug de la/ me tog ku mu ta ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs thogs med rgyal mtshan 'breg mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pazla ldan dbyangs de'i/ phyag sen mo dag ni bcad na
380b3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs byang chub mchog bgrod lam ston tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzugs de'i/ spyan sngar lam dag mtshon pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder
380b4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs spyod gsal tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros la/ mu tig don la drug ni gtor nis kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rin chen gyis pa phyag dar po byed che
380b5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs zla ba chen po la/ mchod sbyin gling bu dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug dge slong tshe/ chos rnams yang dag gzung phyir sems btud nas/ de bzhin
380b6(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa thogs med dbyangs de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs lha nr-i thaMd gser rtog tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog la// gser gyi slar pa bkang ste gtor te bA nas kyang / dang po
380b7(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// der gshegs pashes gnyen po ni shing rtsamakhan/ byed tshe bad+mor gshegs snyoms par gzigs de la/ khang bzangs dag ni byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu mi sems bskyod/ 
380b8(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs pashes gnyen bzang po tshang ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rlab chen po la/ snod dag chu yis bgang ste rul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o/ bder gshegs rab tu 'i srubs la ston tshe/ de rdo kyi
381a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa bsod nams bzhed de la/ tsa ba dge ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye// bder gshegs bdud rtsi bdag po shing thog byed pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa phung po bcu pa de la ni/ 
381a2(mdo bskal bzang): lhung bzed a 'bra dag gis bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs lhun po'i 'od ni rgyal po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs 'od de la/ grong khyer dag ni bla res g.yogs nas
381a3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bstod// der gshegs 'phags pas ston pa lam ston tshe/ de bzhin ga shegs pa klu'i sbyin pa de'i ni/ laM srung dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed/ de bzhin
381a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa snang ldan khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dbyangs de la/ gser las byas pa'i pad+ma phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs gzi brjid 'bar ba rtsa bdun tshe/ de bzhin ga
381a5(mdo bskal bzang): pa yon tan mthu rtsal la/ rtsa stan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// der gshegs snang gzigs rtsis pa'i khye'u tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sems de la/ rin chen dar ba dag ni
381a6(mdo bskal bzang): phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed// bder gshegs legs spyan rnam smin bca' ba mkhan/ khyed tshe bder gshegs dbyangs kyi sprin de la/ lhung bzed bca' bas bkang ste phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni
381a7(mdo bskal bzang): sems bskyed/ der gshegs legs par dgas pa dpa' bo'i cha/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dbangs de la/ rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// der go shig myingan
381a8(mdo bskal bzang): bral ba rtsis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song spong ba la/ me tog rna rgyan dag ni dul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs rim tshon 'od ni dge slong bsnyen bkur la/ byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i me toH/ 
381b1(mdo bskal bzang): le mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// de bzhin gshegs pa skyed ldan khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes ldan pa la// bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dag ni 'thung nas kyang rang 'o byang chu/ 
381b2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs bsod nams stobs ni khyim bdag tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la/ mal bstan shing bal can ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs yon tan
381b3(mdo bskal bzang): rgya mtsho shing rta mkhan khyed tshe bder gshegs rtul zhugs chen po de la ni/ gnas khang dag ni byug pas byugs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs rmad 'byung snang ba mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gabye ba ste/ 
381b4(mdo bskal bzang): pa brtan re la/ bsnar ma dag ni lhi te phul nas kyang dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ngan spong rgyal po'i btsun mo'i cha/ de bzhin gshegs pa myos pa spong nga la me tog lnga ldi dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub
381b5(mdo bskal bzang): ni sems bskyed/ der gshegs bdud brlag mdzad pa de mag ma'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi me tog la/ mchil lo dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed kha der gshegs bag myed chags ston
381b6(mdo bskal bzang): tshogs pa'i che/ bder gshegs pas mi gyis mi khya 'od de la/ 'phreng ba dag las byas pa'i bla re 'ug dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs mi phyed blo mnga' shan pa'i chi/ de bo nim gshegs pa kun du 'od de la
381b7(mdo bskal bzang): sha'i 'breng ba dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho drang po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nge'i// spyan sngar glu dbyangs dag ni blangs nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems
381b8(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' de mdzad grong dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong zla ba la/ gser gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs tshogs can grong rdal tshong
383a1(mdo bskal bzang): pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs de la/ kha bzang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs rga 'od pad+ma mkhan gyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog
383a2(mdo bskal bzang): de la/ ba dan kang dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs byang chub rgyal mtshan bdun don tshe/ de bzhi na gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/ chos la dga' ba'i na bza' phul nas kyang / dang
383a3(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs ye shes rin chen phreng rgyud tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po lnga/ me tog dag la byas pa'i rgyal mtshan phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyod// bder gshegs
383a4(mdo bskal bzang): shin du bsil ba khyim bdag gi/ bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yid rtod la/ nor bu rin chen mchil lam phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs rgyal dang dpon tshe/ de bzhin
383a5(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin de la/ gser las byas pa'i gos dag phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyas pa shing rta mkhan/ byed tshe bder gshegs
383a6(mdo bskal bzang): yid bzhin 'byor pa 'o// bzhugs khri bu dag ni dngul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshogs rdzu 'phrul rtog ni gar mkhan tshe/ bder gshegs thar pa rgyas de'i ni/ spyan sngar grogar
383a7(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs skye dbang mtshungs mod tshong dpon gyi/ bu tshe bder gshegs stabs 'jog la/ gser sku dag gi gtor ba byas kyang / dang po byang
383a8(mdo bskal bzang): chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs sa'i dbang phyug sngon pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dag 'dul ba la/ rtsa las byas pa'i 'ching lham phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye'o// 
383b1(mdo bskal bzang): bder gshegs nyi ma rgyas pa phye mkhan tshe/ byed tshe bder gshegs yul med spong ba la/ ud pal zhal spos dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs sgra gcan zla ba gzhan
383b2(mdo bskal bzang): bran tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dud rtsi'i 'od de le/ rtsa'i khang bzangs byas te phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs me tog 'od ni dge slong tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dar ma'i
383b3(mdo bskal bzang): sems pa la/ mchil snod dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i bdag po bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag sgra sgrogs la/ bye du
383b4(mdo bskal bzang): las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' bzo mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med spyan de la/ nam bza' dag ni dbul ba byas nas
383b5(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ bder gshegs bsod nams gyes pa bram ze'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs dpa' bo la/ me tog zad mi shes pa gtor nas kyang / dang po byang chub
383b6(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnga mkhan tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/ rnga bo che dag rdung ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
383b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa dbyangs snyan phyug po'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs de la/ gling bu dag ni bud pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chos kyi nga
383b8(mdo bskal bzang): phyag bram ze'i bur gyur che/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs de la/ ke shi dag las byas na bza' phul nas kyang / ru// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ 
384a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa tshungs dbyangs zhing ba'i tshe// bsod nams 'dod phyir khron drung chu snod bzhag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa chen po la// dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed do//

384a3(mdo bskal bzang): bu mkhan byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sems spyod bdud rtsi la// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag bsgrags nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs pa khyim bdag tshe// brtsug
384a4(mdo bskal bzang): lag khang ni stong snyed byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros gsal ba la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs snyan grogs tshong dpon dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma

385b4(mdo bskal bzang): pe byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan gzi brjid phung po ni// cheng po byed tshe bder gshegs mi'i pad ma la// ras yug zung du sbyar te dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed

385b6(mdo bskal bzang): zhing sbyangs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i mchog de la// a ti mu ti'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog

386a2(mdo bskal bzang): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dbyigs mchog ral pa can gyi tshe// bdar gshegs bsam gyi mi khyab stegs de la// rtsa'i mal stan dag ni phul nus kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
386a3(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs 'jig rten dga' ba tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la// 'phreng ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bde ga shegs ches kyi zla ba lag zla tshe// de bzhin
386a4(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa phung po chen po la// shing mtshon dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs dga' mtha' yas grags ni phyag rdzi'i dpon po che na bder gshegs stobs bcu
386a5(mdo bskal bzang): la// 'o ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin tog gis tshang che// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor ye shes la// ras yug dag na dbul ba byas na
386a6(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyedado// bder gshegs shesA rab 'gros ni khyim bdag tshe/ 'khor gyi khyams dag phyag dar byas nas kyang // de bzhin gsheg pa drag shul glog gros la// dang po byang chub ti nr-i sems/ 
386a7(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzang dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang blo nga la// mar me snying po dgra nr-i phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gash+ye na mkha'i dbyings ni tshong ba'i
386a8(mdo bskal bzang): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes pa la// na bza' phrag gcig cig ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gsheg lha ni lha ris pa'i tshe// phyag dar ngag ni bya ba byas na kyang // de bzhin/ 
386b1(mdo bskal bzang): bya dpal gyi mchog ga dang po byang na bduni sems bstod// de gzhi na gshegs pa dbul gri bshes bskyen la// 'o ma dag ni dbul bzlas nas b+hA rlung blo byung chub ni sems bskyed do// bder ga she
386b2(mdo bskal bzang): nor bu gsal ba'i dka' thub can// byed tshe bder gshegs yid gnyis slong ba po// de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bzangs
386b3(mdo bskal bzang): spos tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ldan de la/ kar sha pa na gaN+DI ga ri'i 'bru mar dang // spos phul dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron mya 'ge'u ta ma no// dbyar gnas pa dag das
386b4(mdo bskal bzang): babyas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa sras kyi dpal de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin can ngo ro dbyangs// tshong ngus pa de ba der gshegs dgra bcom gnas// de la zhun mar bri gang / 
386b5(mdo bskal bzang): nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skye dbang rgyal po tshong dpon tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gnas de la// kun dga' ra ba dag ni phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems
386b6(mdo bskal bzang): bskyed do// bder gau shegs sgra can sbed pa shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus cher dragongs la// sgye'u gra sher dug gi dum bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub ti na sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa dge mdzad
386b7(mdo bskal bzang): chu tshun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'odi ni 'bar ba la// chu drang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyeda'o// bder gshegs seng ge blo gros khyim bdag tshe// dri bzhin gshegs pa mthu 'a rtsal skud pa la// me tog bstan
386b8(mdo bskal bzang): stug pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen grags pa shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gsheg pa dgongs pa zab sgoms la// sgra dbyangs dag gi mchod pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// 
387a1(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad phyug po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spos sred de la ni// rnga bo che dag btung ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs mdzad mtha' gzigs pa khyim bdag tshe// 
387a2(mdo bskal bzang): gtsug lag khang dag byas te phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po la// dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// bder gshegs srid pa'i me tog khrus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed glo la// khrus ras
387a3(mdo bskal bzang): ngag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mdzod sgra ldan pa drang srong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la// ku na sha las byas pa'i na bza' phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed
387a4(mdo bskal bzang): do&bader gshegs slebs pa mtshungs med rgyal po'i ri mo mkhan// byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod pa po// de la me tog dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gsheg rnam 'byed/ 
387a5(mdo bskal bzang): nga ro 'gron po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs seng ge la// lam srang dag tu gos dag bting pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs seng ge'i mche ba dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye she
387a6(mdo bskal bzang): blo gros la/ lhur bzed cu du skyu ru ras bkang phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs mdzes par gshegs pa ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lhun po la// seng ge'i ba dan khri dag ni phul nas kyang / 
387a7(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// ba der gshegs bsod nams 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro sbyangs pa la// rin po che las byas pa'i bla re phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gsheg chos sgron/ 
387a8(mdo bskal bzang): gdugs ni tshang po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba rnam 'byed la// lhung bzed rin po che dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs bkra shis ldan pa tshong pa'i dpon po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs/ 
387b1(mdo bskal bzang): pa gsal ba'i dpal de la// kun dga' ra ba ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// bder gshegs yul 'khor mya ngan med pa po// tshong dpon de tshe stan rings phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang
387b2(mdo bskal bzang): la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// baner gshegs blo gros sems pa khyim bdag tshe// gnas dang zas kyi rkye ni ras bcad nas kyang // bder gshegs yon tan phung po 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de
387b3(mdo bskal bzang): bzhin gsheg pa blo ldan 'ug pa'i tshe/ gos dang shing leb dag ni bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// bder gshegs chos sgron spyan ni dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin ga bye
387b4(mdo bskal bzang): blo gros ldan de la// rgyu sran dras pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tra ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs shugs 'don bu ram tshang mkha na tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grangs rgyal po lo// bA ram shing gi bcud khu btung ba phul
387b5(mdo bskal bzang): dang po byang chub tA ni sems bskyedado// bder gshegs stobs chen tshong pa'o chung ma'i tshe// phye khal gsum ni mnyug mar bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// baM der gshegs/ 
387b6(mdo bskal bzang): shes rab me tog ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi mchog ma de'i// lam srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs brtan pa'i dbyangs ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin
387b7(mdo bskal bzang): gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer la// gos kyi bla re dag ni phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ldan smad cheng tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sems pa la// shA'i phyur ma dag ni phul nas
387b8(mdo bskal bzang): kyang / dang pa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa don gsum tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs po tshogs can rab mchog la// ku sha'i bdan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyedado// bder ga
388a1(mdo bskal bzang): dges gsal grong rdal ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa btsug phud dges de la// kha ra dag dang sbyar ba'i btung ba bu la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskye do// bder gshegs seng ge zhal ni phreng rgyud tshe// bdar gshegs
388a2(mdo bskal bzang): kha dog zil gyis mi non la// me tog khal bcu dag ni rtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phyung shang srung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la// spos dang oM 'bru 'bras bu phul nA/ 
388a3(mdo bskal bzang): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal ba'i// bshes dag bdag nyid btsongs te sbyar nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// sangs rgya
388a4(mdo bskal bzang): stong gi sngon gyi tshul// rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// de ltar sangs rgyas dag la chung ba yis// yon phul rnam par smin pa 'di dag yin/ 'khor tshe de'i 'bras bu de 'dran
388a5(mdo bskal bzang): mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems mi skyed/ nam mkha' dag ni tshad dag bzung ba dang // rgya mtsho chen po mtha' gyis bgrang nus kyang / sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shes tsam gyis bsod nams tshad bzung ba ni nus par dka'// ji srid mya
388a6(mdo bskal bzang): ngan 'das ba de ma reg par// de srid mi khom sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur// de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas// bag yod ma yis bkur sti mchad pa gyis// sangs rgyas dag la lhag par mos pa'i// bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku
388a7(mdo bskal bzang): gdung la/ mchod pa chung shas byed pa'i yon tan myAthal// bsam par nus pa yin na de lta zhog/ byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba yon phul dang / gang dag tshad med chos 'di bzhi po dang // na mkha'i khams dang sems can khams kun dag/ sngon
388a8(mdo bskal bzang): pa ma rtogs shes par nus pa med/ gang phyir sems can thams cad rjes bzung phyir// byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar// dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyi// gter dag rnyed pa de ltar dga' ma yin// sangs rgyas
388b1(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub phyir ni rgyal ba'i// rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang // sems can sdud pa lnga brgya dga' mdzad gzhi// rtog byed 'jug pa dang ni brgyad khri dang // rtogs par byed pa brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang // bla na med pa'i sgo mo drug khri
388b2(mdo bskal bzang): dang / sa rnams 'byed dang ye shes bdun bcu drug/ sangs rgyas mtshon pa spyod pa bcwo brgyad pa// pha rol gnon pa lnga dang bstan pa bcu// spyod yul ther 'bum phrag ni bcu gcig dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi yon tan gang // 
388b3(mdo bskal bzang): mtshan dpe byad dag dang spyod lam dag/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul lam min la/ nyan thos sgra rjes 'phreng ba smos ci rgas// mtshungs pa med po 'dra ba yong min pas// des na sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab ces brjod// gang dag byang chub mchog
388b4(mdo bskal bzang): reg sems yod pas// de dang de dag mi dag mtshungs med spyod// de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed// de dag 'jig rten legs par 'tsho bas 'tsho// bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi reg byas nas// char smin lhun sdug lta bur tshim par byed// 
388b5(mdo bskal bzang): gang de byang chub la bzhugs 'jig rten skyob// de dag nor bdun dag gis bsdu bar byed// gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang brjod byed pa// des na byang chub gang bzhugs skyo mi 'gyur// de yis mchod rten de dag myur thob la// 'jig rten kun gyis
388b6(mdo bskal bzang): mchog ma dag du 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur// gang gi rnam par smin pas ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// mtho ris 'gro dang byang chub yon tan gyis phyir/ mkhas pa su zhig byis pa dag dang 'gal bar byed// 
388b7(mdo bskal bzang): byis pa mkhas pa dag la mi byed// mi shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thog/ blun po 'dam bying mkhas pa thang la gnas// gang dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzongs de lwa bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing // gang dag shes yul rig
388b8(mdo bskal bzang): ldan rten par bya// dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal 'byor bya/ sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang // bskal pa khri phrag tshad ni bzod byed na/ sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med smos
389a1(mdo bskal bzang): gci rgos// de bas sdug bsngal nyams thag dang du lo pa/ bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi go bgos la// brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon// sbyin stobs shes rab mda' yis bdud bcom ste// 
389a2(mdo bskal bzang): pham byas byang chub dag la reg par gyis// byams pa'i grogs dang bsgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang // dbyer med pha rol phyin pa spros byed dang // stong pa'i gnas bcas shugs kyis zas rten te// thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ 
389a3(mdo bskal bzang): yon tan thob par gyis// de bas ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la// bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyor ba gyis// mkhas la ring ba'i skad 'byin dga' ba ltar// thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thob par gyis// mchog tu
389a4(mdo bskal bzang): dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor ther 'bum rnyed dang // bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te// tingange 'dzin 'di ston/ ting 'dzin 'di ston pa na// 
389a5(mdo bskal bzang): de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas// des btsun mo stong dang sras stong la smras pa// ting nge 'dzin zad par snang ba 'di yi don kyang mi shes so// ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang mi nus// 
389a6(mdo bskal bzang): de ltar yin gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la// bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing // bshad pa'i tingange 'dzin 'di la rje su yi rang
389a7(mdo bskal bzang): bar byas pas de dag rje su yi rang ba'i mdo' las// bskal pa brgyad khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil nas// de las kha phyir phyogs par gyur to// khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang thob par gyur to// byang chub ji skad bstan pa la yang / 
389a8(mdo bskal bzang): the tsom med par gyur to// dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni sangs rgyas sum 'brum dag mnyes par byas par gyur to// thams cad du yang tinge 'dzin pa 'di thob par gyur to// log par ltung ba dang / maM khom pa dag du nam yang ltung bar ma gyur to// rgyu de kho na
389b1(mdo bskal bzang): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod de'i tshe// de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba khyod kyis// de gzhan yin
389b2(mdo bskal bzang): no snyam du de ltar blta bar mi bya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i tshe// de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur to// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de'i tshe// de'i dus na/ sras
389b3(mdo bskal bzang): sdong da gyur to// de ltar rjes sa yi rang ba tsam gyis kyang / ting 'dzin 'di mthu tshe ba yin na/ klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / sgrub pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i des na// 
389b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba// 'khor 'bum snyed dang / bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po// blo yangs shes bya bas khang bzangs gser dang ldan pa/ tsan tan dmar po/ 
389b5(mdo bskal bzang): chus btab pa/ a ka ru'i bdug pas/ gdugs pa zhig phul lo// longs spyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la yod/ de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur to// de dag thams cad la yang skyed mos tshal re re
389b6(mdo bskal bzang): yang phul bar gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das 'di las/ ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan pa yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro ba mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog/ shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhi gro byung bar gyur to// 
389b7(mdo bskal bzang): des 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin shes par bya na/ khyim na gnas pas ni/ 'di rtogs par dka'i/ ji nas kyang bdag gis skra dang / kha spu bregs la/ rta khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya gor ma chag go// 
389b8(mdo bskal bzang): zhes smras so// de nas des skra dang / kha sku bregs nas gos dur smrig bgos te/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ sras khri dang / btson mo brgyad stong de dag thas cad dang / lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa dag
390a1(mdo bskal bzang): no zhes pa dang / bco ldani 'ongs kyis/ de dag gi bsam pa thugs chud nas kyang // ting 'dzin 'di dag mdun gyi bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// de dag gi thos nas kyang / gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye ma ting 'dzin 'di thob par dga'// 
390a2(mdo bskal bzang): med kyi/ 'on kyang tingange 'dzin 'di legs par bris te bcang bar bya'o// zhes 'dzer to// de dag tha~Md kyis/ ting 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang / mchod par bya'o// bzung ngo // lung yang 'bogo// de nas de dag thaMd dus las langs nas/ slar de dag tshogs
390a3(mdo bskal bzang): par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas drug 'ablam mnyes par byas par 'gyur to// thas cad du ni ting 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to// thams cad du rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to// smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas/ 
390a4(mdo bskal bzang): tha~Md kyis byang chub rab tu thob par gyur to// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs te/ khyod kyi gzhan yin no// snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de de'i tshe/ 
390a5(mdo bskal bzang): de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni/ dge slong rim gro shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to// gang dag sras khri po de dag ni/ bskal pa 'di nas bzung ste/ bskal pa
390a6(mdo bskal bzang): drug bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyu ro// de'i 'og tu/ bskal pa grangs med pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa gcig po de la/ de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// gang dag blo na po brgyad khri po de/ 
390a7(mdo bskal bzang): dag ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa chen po 'das nas/ bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur// de'i 'og tu skal ba skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la blan po brgyad khri bo dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
390a8(mdo bskal bzang): 'gyuro// skal ba skar ma lta bu 'das nas/ skal pa sum brgya na/ sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de'i 'og tu/ bskal pa suM brgyam po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ba 'gyur te/ btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par
390b1(mdo bskal bzang): 'tshang bar 'gyu ro// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub seMs dpa'i ting 'dzin 'di ni/ de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de bas na/ byang chub seMs dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa/ lus dang / srog la mi lnga
390b2(mdo bskal bzang): bar gyur pas/ ting 'dzin 'di lta bur btsal bar bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ ting 'dzin 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshen tshig su
390b3(mdo bskal bzang): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang / de dag rgyal po de'i rje su slobs// yang dag sgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ma thob mi 'gyur// de ltar 'dir ni dad pa chung bskyed kya
390b4(mdo bskal bzang): de bzhin rje smin gya no ma thob par 'gyur// de bas g.yo med lhag pa'i bas pa yi// 'dir ni ci rigs bkur stir rnal 'byor gyis// rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir sgrags la// de dag zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang // bstan pa rgya cher bshad par
390b5(mdo bskal bzang): 'dod pa dang // ji ltar bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor gyis/ yid rang nyid kyis phun sum tshogs 'gyur na// 'chang dang klog pa lta zhig ci smos te// yon tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam mi nas// 'di thosu zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed// byang / 
390b6(mdo bskal bzang): chub so so yang dag rig mtshan dang // stan dang pha rol sems ni gleng ba dang // bsgrub dang na snang ba gang dag sangs rgyas chos// ti nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya// las sbyor de bzhin bdud rnams 'joms pa dang // lto skyong de bzhin/ 
390b7(mdo bskal bzang): srid pa zad byed dang // rnam par rol dang zhing bkod 'byer pa dag/ 'di dag rab tu ldan la 'gon ma yin// de bzhin rnam rol spobs pa phun tshogs dang // bya ba thams cad skyong byed gzungs dag dang // bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshan
390b8(mdo bskal bzang): rgya ba// de dag tha 'dir gnas mod pa yin// nga yis de bsnyed tshig gis brjod nas rnams// de lta bas na/ de dag 'dir bsgrubs shig/ kun mkhyen chos la dga' ba ma byas ni// phyis dus dag na 'gyod par gyur ta ro// pha rol gyim
